column3: Senior ASO Consultant Mobile Marketing m f d
column11: What To Expect We re looking for a Senior ASO Consultant to join our growing ASO team at Phiture You ll be responsible for working on the App and Play Store presences of apps with millions of users identifying areas for improvement and communicating results to our clients You ll be driving forward individual ASO client projects while devising methods and strategies to ensure that future projects are a success Over the past 5 years Phiture has attracted more than 100 industry experts from 41 different countries to our Berlin base in the centre of the start up scene We are now expanding our world class team of mobile marketing professionals globally and building out our first international talent hubs If you re a driven Senior ASO Consultant based in the UK with excellent industry knowledge and experience in leading top quality creative projects we want you What You ll Do Manage several client accounts driving ASO projects forward and ensuring overall successIncrease organic downloads by conducting keyword optimization and conversion rate optimization for the App and Play Store presences of client appsManage and train one or more Junior ASO consultants on App Store Optimization who will assist you with execute on the client workHold workshops and train up external client teams on ASO onsite and offsite in the US and EuropeBrief designers and translators on creative experiments as well as the localization of app store assetsDevise new methods and strategies for ASO to make our client projects a success and give us a competitive edgeProduce relevant content and data driven articles for our ASO knowledge base and the ASO Stack publicationRepresent Phiture at mobile growth conferences giving ASO workshops talks and recruiting potential clientsSupport other mobile growth related activities of the company What You Bring To Us At least 1 year of ASO experience 2 years of mobile marketing experience with an app publisher agency or similarOutspoken and strong comfortable in client facing situations excellent presentation skills and ability to communicate defend results to clientsStrong project and team management skills experience with leading ASO projectsExcellent knowledge of App Play store developer consoles key ASO metrics and mobile marketing terminologyIn depth experience with A B testing of creative assets on Android and iOS and managing backlogs of experimentsExperience with keyword optimization relevant tools and processes ability to bring personal learnings into our teamAbility to make sense of and effectively analyze various types of data strong knowledge of spreadsheetsOutstanding if not native written and verbal English language skillsOpen to startup culture open to change and helping out in different areas What We Offer You Share in Phiture s success through a company wide bonus schemeAllocated budget of 1 000 euro every year for your personal development as well as your own Udemy for Business accountMonthly learning day to support your personal and professional growthCareer roadmap and personal development plan to support a progressive learning curveContinuous performance and developmental feedback throughout the yearComprehensive access to mental health support from licensed therapists via our partnership with the Oliva platform30 days of paid vacation every yearFlexible working hours so you can work when you re most productiveUnlimited remote work within Germany along with an allowance of 60 days of international remote work every yearSpacious office in the heart of Berlin we all work to ensure we foster a daily feel good atmosphereOnboarding package including state of the art technologyOpportunity to actively influence change by joining our internal Culture Climate Action and Diversity Inclusion teamsAn absolute sense of unity we are all aiming toward the same goal of leading the way in mobile growth

column3: Senior Solution Consultant B2B Marketing Pardot
column11: To get the best candidate experience please consider applying for a maximum of 3 roles within 12 months to ensure you are not duplicating efforts Job Category Sales Job Details Part of the lead to cash platform B2B marketing automation by Salesforce helps marketers create more leads generate more pipeline and empower sales to close more deals In addition Salesforce B2B marketing automation also helps organizations service customers ensuring top notch customer service throughout the sales and post sales life cycles as Marketing is the glue of the customer experience across all touch points Salesforce B2B Marketing is a leading global provider of cross channel B2B marketing automation solutions that empower organisations of all sizes to communicate with their prospects customers through Email Mobile Social Media Web and other sales channels What s in it for you What you will get from us is best in class training including a virtual Boot Camp outstanding benefits including Health Insurance Wellness allowance Corporate Amex etc and outstanding support from wider Pre sales teams Sales Leaders Marketing Lead Generation and training services along with a clear and achievable career path Job Description There is more to this role than being a Solutions Engineer specialising in B2B Marketing We are looking for an enthusiastic passionate b2b marketing lover who will act as a regional evangelist product manager and a true business partner to the sales team Day to day a B2B Marketing Solutions Engineer is at the forefront of the B2B Marketing automation technology landscape This role will work closely with the B2B Marketing Specialist Sales team to uncover real business problems faced by customers and prospects to develop solutions and processes to not only overcome these obstacles but also deliver phenomenal digital transformation You will be responsible for partnering with B2B Marketing Account Executives to deliver business value based solutions firmly positioning Salesforce as the partner of choice for B2B Marketing Automation CRM as well as keeping in touch with the product management team An awesome Solution Engineer is seen as the trusted advisor and they focus on the following key areas Discovery Work closely with business stakeholders and technical resources to understand how to make B2B marketers successful and to address pain points in their current efforts Design Create innovative solutions which demonstrate how connected experiences come to life with Salesforce B2B Marketing Automation capabilities Deliver Connect business requirements with Salesforce solutions technology to deliver presentations demonstrations workshops or white boarding sessions which engage a business technical audience Enable the wider internal and external communities on B2B marketing automation trends product developments etc Digest Stay up to date on the latest B2B Marketing product development and roadmap industry trends and industry news The Basics Minimum 3 years in B2B Marketing Automation Demonstrable understanding of B2B technology ecosystem including CRM Marketing Automation Email SMS Social Web Advertising Social platforms Facebook Google LinkedIn Web search technologies and strategies SEO SEM Tag management platforms Google Adobe Tealium etc Content management platforms Adobe Drupal Sitecore Wordpress etc Web analytics tools Google Analytics Adobe Analytics etc Event Management Solutions EventBrite CVent etc Understanding of B2B marketing dynamics compared to B2C marketing Pre sales consulting experience RFP support Discovery Demonstration POC Solution Design Excellent presentation skills Compelling story teller Basic programming experience in HTML and other web based technologies Experience in deploying web tracking such as image pixels and JavaScript to track web activity Solid verbal written presentation and interpersonal communication skills Ability to work as part of a team or as an individual to solve technical problems in varied political environments Fluent German and English are a must have Ready to join Salesforce The extra 1 Previous experience as a sales engineer for a CRM company or similar technology Previous experience with the Salesforce Sales Service and or Marketing Clouds Public speaking experience Events Webinars B2B Marketing Automation Network Contacts Partners Broader knowledge of web programming and debugging technologies CRM experience Salesforce Microsoft Dynamics Oracle SAP etc B2B Marketing Automation platform experience Pardot Eloqua Hubspot Marketo Silverpop Act On Infusionsoft etc Experience in Social Media advertising Search Display Knowledge of CRM Marketing Clouds Advertising Clouds Analytics knowledge visualisation tools B Computer Science Software Engineering or MIS LI Y Accommodations If you require assistance due to a disability applying for open positions please submit a request via this Accommodations Request Form Posting Statement At Salesforce we believe that the business of business is to improve the state of our world Each of us has a responsibility to drive Equality in our communities and workplaces We are committed to creating a workforce that reflects society through inclusive programs and initiatives such as equal pay employee resource groups inclusive benefits and more Learn more about Equality at Salesforce and explore our benefits Salesforce com and Salesforce org are Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employers Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender perception or identity national origin age marital status protected veteran status or disability status Salesforce com and Salesforce org do not accept unsolicited headhunter and agency resumes Salesforce com and Salesforce org will not pay any third party agency or company that does not have a signed agreement with Salesforce com or Salesforce org Salesforce welcomes all

column3: Junior Online Marketing Manager Berlin
column11: About The Role DOES DRIVING GROWTH FOR ONE OF THE MOST INNOVATIVE BRANDS IN CONSTRUCTION TECH EXCITE YOU magicplan is one of global leading construction and floor plan apps with over 500 000 downloads per month 4 8 rating in App store and 50 international employees working in offices in Munich Berlin Nantes and Montreal We are looking for a new colleague to join our fast growing company s Marketing team in Berlin office as Junior Online Marketing Manager m w d Where will you work As a new member of our Marketing team which is in charge of positioning and promoting our Sketch Report and Estimate solutions your main tasks include lead generation and product feature communication of our iOS Android app as well as the cloud service Your job responsibilities will include among others Building and orchestrating digital advertising and automated email nurturing campaigns in our martech stack based on the demand funnel frameworkCollaborating with internal teams to build landing pages managing conversion tests and optimizing the user experienceBuilding and maintaining analytics including trends conversion rates and overall performanceWorking with the team for life cycle journeys content and frameworks to enhance prospect progressionConsulting with PPC and SEO team to expand and improve acquisition campaignsExpanding growing and transforming current paid acquisition programsCollaborating cross functionally with marketing team members to hit KPI goals What You ll Do In the first 3 months we ll help you to Learn about the product and its features Get in touch with most of our 50 colleaguesGet familiar with internal processesAdopt company cultureStart working on your first marketing tasks under mentoring of senior colleagues In the next 3 months you should Start taking over individual marketing tasks with support from senior colleaguesCollaborate on tasks with other teamsGet full understanding of stakeholdership and processes By the end of the year we ll make sure you are ready to Work independently on majority of tasksTake own initiative while developing marketing campaignsTake more ownership and responsibility About You You have a master s or bachelor s degree in business administration marketing or similarYou have first professional experience in performance based direct response online marketing on in house marketing teams creative agencies or startups experience in B2B app marketing is beneficial You have a growth mindset always making improvements trying new things rolling with changes failing fast and a can do attitudeYou have a general understanding and experience with marketing automation systems lifecycle marketing tactics user segmentation and other key marketing principlesYou are creative and enjoy digital advertising briefs and assets creationYou have strong interpersonal skills you are easy going and like to work in an informal organizationYou have excellent written and oral communication skills in English German and or French is a plus You are highly organized and self motivated with a high level of initiative Why us Completely flexible working hours and home officeApple equipmentFree drinks coffee fruit snack all over the placePublic transportation ticket or gym membershipYearly personal development budget for courses and educationCompany pension schemeCompany parties minimum twice per year Summer winter Oktoberfest etc Travel visit and work from Montreal or Nantes offices with our colleagues in Canada or FranceAnd one more thing Iceland teambuilding trip real Iceland with geysers and volcanoes Covid 19 prevented us last and this year but all 50 of us will gather in Iceland as soon as we will be able to travel freely and without restrictions Interested We are looking forward to receiving your application About Magicplan magicplan builds mobile and cloud software to capture interior spaces and assist in the planning of construction jobs We re striving to become the go to solution to capture interior spaces with a mobile device By combining Augmented Reality and Artificial Intelligence we facilitate on site data acquisition categorisation and processing magicplan assists in the planning estimating and scheduling of renovation restoration and remodelling jobs We believe in questioning the status quo in the building industry to provide contractors with a better way to get work done while on the go Over 20 million users and major corporations use magicplan and have created the largest floor plan database in the world Over 79 000 projects per week were managed by using magicplan We re proud to be trusted by 5000 businesses We re always looking to hire the best and brightest If you re a flexible problem solver able to think critically on your feet and build the best solution for the context apply today Start with magicplan on our journey to change the work of millions of building and renovation experts around the world So if this role speaks to you we encourage you to apply to our team We look forward to hearing from you magicplan is an equal opportunity employer committed to diversity and fair working practices

Google Partner und Reseller im Bereich der Google Marketing Platform sowie der Google Cloud Platform wir sind auch Katalysator für innovative digitale Marketing Ideen Für Trakken arbeiten bedeutet dass Du Teil eines inspirierenden internationalen und diversen Team in einem schnell wachsenden Tech Umfeld wirst Wir bieten den idealen Arbeitsplatz für jeden jede der die mitwachsen und gestalten column3: Digital Marketing Manager
column11: Our client is a fast growing Medical Device company providing innovative solutions to the Healthcare market We have been tasked to find and recruit a highly experienced Digital Marketing Manager to help the company drive its operational excellence while working in a young friendly and ambitious team in an international working environment The candidates can be based anywhere in Europe To be successful in this role you must have significant experience in Google Facebook Instagram YouTube and Outbrain advertisement organic lead generation and to be able to implement omnichannel marketing campaigns You are perfect for this role if you have demonstrable success experience in content writing and digital marketing campaigns Key Responsibilities Will Include Work closely with top management and sales team to develop the optimal products roadmap and build brand awareness from marketing product roadmap to executionDevelop specific campaigns to create and maintain high levels of customer interactionStay up to date with digital technology developments and manage all digital marketing channels to ensure brand consistencyManage and improve online content considering SEO and Google Analytics and measure ROI and KPIs and prepare a budgetOwnership of the pilot product launches executions and monitoring as well as execute all product launch presentations and create and conduct training for multiple teams Key Skills And Experience Required At least 4 years of proven successful digital marketing experienceExperience with HubSpot Salesforce and similar platforms is a must for the roleDemonstrable success in digital communications and content driven campaignsExperience in Google Facebook Instagram YouTube and Outbrain advertisements organic lead generationFluency in English both written and spokenAbility to implement omnichannel marketing campaigns including SEO social media and email marketingEducated to degree level in Marketing or equivalent in relevant fieldHighly capable of using lead management data and digital engagement tactics and techniques

column3: Growth Marketing Manager
column11: Kaia is a mission focused health technology company Our story began in 2016 when our founders Konstantin Mehl and Manuel Thurner created a mission to bring affordable and accessible relief to millions of people with chronic conditions No strangers to chronic pain themselves they decided to innovate ways to remove the obstacles many people experience in getting the leading edge care they need How do Kaia apps work Kaia uses a dynamic AI powered algorithm Our programs are based on multimodal rehabilitation a holistic approach to managing chronic conditions Our users have easy access via smartphone and tablet to our programs for back hip knee pain and COPD using this evidence based approach Five years into our story we are a leader in digital therapeutics with 500 000 users worldwide Having raised 125 million from investors like Optum Ventures idInvest and Balderton Capital to name a selected few we are poised to create a global footprint in digital self care Kaia is patient empowerment made easy The regulatory landscape is quickly adapting to the digital ecosystem Therefore our mission and strategy bring new opportunities for determined talent to join our journey With over 100 Kaianeers spread across the US and Europe we now need more specialized talent to help take our mission further We are looking for a passionate growth marketing manager who will be a part of scaling our marketing organization and accelerating growth for our products You will report to the VP Marketing You would work along other members of the growing marketing team like a copywriter and a CRM manager on daily business tasks as well as members of the B2B marketing and business development teams Your main focus is on launching and scaling performance marketing channels such as Google Facebook or app store ads as well as future growth opportunities You are a highly motivated person and know marketing platforms like Google Ads by heart The role can be based in Munich or Berlin and can be partially remote You Will Thrive In This Role If You Have done it before Show us that you have designed set up executed analyzed and tweaked successful growth marketing campaigns for mobile apps before such as Facebook Google or App Install campaigns a passion for data analyze and report on experiment performance communicating learnings progress timelines and results a hands on mentality be open to learn new things in different fieldsstrong research quantitative skills and analytical mindset with academic training an eye for detail but also the big picture in mindhigh EQ and excellent communication skills in English and German required Ideally You Also Have at least 2 years of experience in the field of paid acquisition campaigns in a growth marketing team an analytical mind and a mastery of campaign A B testing You take a data driven approach to derive insights and adjust strategy accordingly Excellent excel and data analysis skills you know how to analyze and improve campaign KPIs across all channelsexperience in working in a healthcare setting or being exposed to medical regulation regarding data privacy You Will Enjoy Our Company Culture If You are user centric and view technology as a tool to improve a user s lifehave a bias for action the world is a complex and unpredictable place so starting releasing and getting feedback iteratively is the only possible path to successstrive to be articulate and humble make the complex simple present ideas openly accepting that being wrong is part of the processare not afraid of tackling problems that others deem impossiblethrive in an entrepreneurial team adapt easily to change and enjoy a fast paced environment Some Of The Benefits Of Being a Kaianeer You can directly influence the future of digital health in a team of industry experts and digital shapers You will work alongside serial entrepreneurs previously founded and scaled another startup Foodora You ll enjoy flat hierarchies a hybrid work from home office environment and flexible vacation and working times We support your professional development and have a budget set aside for you just for that Happy hours team events and knowledge sharing sessions galore Join us if you re looking for an entrepreneurial adventure and an exciting place to grow personally and professionally

column3: Performance Marketing Manager d f m
column11: Do you like ads So do we In fact Performance Marketing is currently one of our main traffic drivers This is why we need some more talents to add to our awesome team We re looking for a Performance Marketing Manager to help us get the most out of our advertising budgets This person will report to the Head of Performance Marketing and will be part of our centralized Marketing department that supports all our brands Your Challenge Take charge of the full paid advertising process Plan create analyze optimize and report ads Get the best results out of our performance channels with a focus on Facebook Instagram and SEMConceptualize run and document experiments that aim to continuously improve resultsAnalyze data to find the best setup for our automated prospecting and retargeting campaignsReport back results to the brand stakeholders and together with them come up with exciting new ad ideasWork closely with our inhouse creative team to make sure we always run the most engaging ads About You At least 2 years of hands on experience in performance marketing preferably in an e commerce environmentFacebook and or Google Ads hold no more secrets for you and you ve been responsible for 6 digit budgets beforeProven success with optimizing towards both revenue and retention KPIsGreat analytical skills excel sheets make you happy and you don t shy away from complex topics like attributionGood understanding of common performance marketing tools such as Google Analytics FB Business manager etc Bonus points for experience with one of these channels Affiliate display native advertisingPlus points if your German is at least at B1 level What Realtainment can offer you An innovative fast growing company with significant investments A 1200 sqm office space with a feel good factor A platform to bring out the creative and fun side in you by participating in our awesome events like ArtNight PlantNight BakeNight and ShakeNight Open minded and ambitious colleagues who are looking forward to taking off with you and celebrating success at exuberant team events We have an authentic feedback culture constructive and open which always focuses on promoting your personal development and growth Did we spark your interest to join a challenge in an ambitious creative and fast growing company Then apply now with your detailed application information about your salary expectations and your earliest possible starting date Ann Margret is looking forward to your application We connect people with varied events that offer a high entertainment factor and where everyone learns something new More than 80 employees and a network of over 900 workshop leaders give their best every day to build Europe s leading platform for creative experiences As a team we attach great importance to being ourselves and to doing exactly what drives us every day To further revolutionize the way people get together We build teams that challenge the status quo grow as a unit and bring the importance of interpersonal relationships alongside with our unique products We live with diversity and equal opportunities In our teams we welcome every applicant regardless of gender ethnic origin religion age sexual identity disability or other grounds of discrimination Personal formulations in the job advertisement are to be considered gender neutral

column3: Online Marketing Manager Native Advertising m f x
column11: The role As an Online Marketing Manager Native Advertising m f x you ll be responsible for our Native Marketing initiatives across all countries and brands You will work in a data driven environment with both our local and global growth teams and manage our agencies to achieve our ambitious growth plans Above all we are looking for people who will make HelloFresh better We believe there are many different ways of developing skills and we love diverse experiences So even if you don t tick all the boxes but think you d thrive in this role we would really like to learn more about you What You ll Do Build a strong growth plan for the channel together with internal and external partnersDevelop launch and analyze A B tests for new creatives partners and business opportunitiesManage the whole funnel for your channel by optimizing our creatives landing pages and copywriting Collaborate with our local teams and our agency partners on a daily basisFacilitate weekly update calls with our agencies and report channel performance on a regular basis What You ll Bring You have relevant experience with Native Advertising and content driven marketing campaignsYou are driven to deliver high performing scalable solutions in a dynamic marketing channelYou have a proven track record of handling agencies and working with international teams You have used tools such like Analytics Tableau Clarisight Google DocsYou make decisions based on rational reasoning and data You feel comfortable using both qualitative and quantitative data to validate hypotheses and drive decisions What We Offer Healthy discount on weekly HelloFresh boxesAnnual learning and development budget to attend conferences or purchase educational resources plus access to the HelloFresh AcademyA diverse and vibrant international environment of 70 different nationalitiesAdditional perks include Free crash course in German compensation for advanced external German classes discounts for our neighboring gym Urban Sports Club summer winter parties discount on our HelloFresh GO vending machinesThe chance to have a significant impact on one of the fastest growing technology companies in Europe in an exciting growth phase About HelloFresh HelloFresh is on a mission to change the way people eat forever Since our 2011 founding in Europe s vibrant tech hub Berlin we ve become the world s leading meal kit provider delivering to over 4 2 million households worldwide in 15 countries across 3 continents Our best in class marketers play vital roles in connecting HelloFresh with new and existing customers across the world Based in Berlin the data driven and creative Global Marketing Team pioneers industry leading research business insight CRM growth marketing and brand communication The team continuously drives our brand forward through experimentation and an entrepreneurial spirit Our more than 15 000 employees from over 70 nationalities are the heart and soul of our diverse fast paced and dynamic environment where innovation and smart fast action is encouraged We will encourage you to make an immediate impact in your area of work as well as empower you to grow your career with us You can get a taste of what we ve been working on by checking out About HelloFresh Are you up for the challenge Please submit your complete application below including your salary expectations and earliest starting date After submitting an application our team will review this and get back to you within 5 business days We are HelloFresh At HelloFresh we embrace and welcome diversity and we currently employ over 15 000 individuals globally who contribute to this We employ individuals based on their ability to perform a job rather than on the basis of their race national origin color caste social origin or position gender gender expression sexual orientation religion age disability political opinion marital status or any other characteristic We encourage everyone to apply and will give everyone equal consideration We are an equal opportunity employer everyone is welcome at our table

column3: SEO Country Manager UK
column11: Back Market is the 1 marketplace for refurbished electronic devices in Europe and in the US leading the way in a shift towards a circular economy freeing the planet from electronic waste We are proud to sabotage new by connecting highly certified professionals to consumers who are looking for a more affordable reliable and an ecological alternative to purchasing brand new products Back Market is undergoing meteoric growth and has raised over 434M already We have the objective of reaching 650 Back Makers or Saboteurs by the end of 2021 We are thrilled to have an inclusive fulfilling and caring work environment in all our offices Paris Bordeaux New York Prague Berlin and Tokyo This is an opportunity for you to join a talented humble and passionate team at the heart of innovation Be a part of the movement Join the refurb revolution The SEO Project Manager is a hands on position You will work both independently and with team members your mission will be to apply best in class SEO optimization to rank our websites on top of Google Results and our brand in our consumers hearts You ll be in charge of implementing our SEO strategy locally to increase our visibility and drive more organic traffic You ll also be part of an exciting highly skilled SEO team that provides a high level experience in managing organic search optimization with in house software programs and at worldwide scale YOUR MISSION IF YOU ACCEPT IT Fully manage SEO visibility in the UK and activate all actions to get maximum visibilityWork with our SEO team to define strategies that can increase our visibility and grow our businessConduct semantic audits to detect ranking opportunitiesCreate a Content Calendar that fits our audience s demandCreate and optimize our SEO content in order to improve organic trafficCreate partnerships with publishers and influencers to grow our popularitySet up and proactively manage projects that align with our strategic goalsEffectively track prioritize manage and report on deliverables assignments and issues related to each projectParticipate in weekly progress meetings to discuss our worldwide strategy and share key learnings with our worldwide teamParticipate in our Content Strategy Council to identify our best opportunitiesLead content agencies to get the best value they can provide in the execution of tasks and processes ensuring quality and deadline adherenceYOU ARE IN THE RIGHT PLACE IF You are a native English speakerYou ve graduated with a Bachelor or Master degree in a Business or a Marketing related fieldYou have 5 years of experience in SEO focused project management ideally in a marketing team or at a digital services agencyYou have knowledge of SEO in both content and link building strategiesYou have experience leading multiple projects in a fast paced environmentYou have the ability to analyze interpret and present data meaningfullyYou demonstrate great written and verbal communication skills with an emphasis on clarity and accuracyYou are an expert working with Google Search Console Ahrefs Google Analytics Screaming Frog working knowledge of HTML and content management systems including WordPress is a plus RECRUITMENT PROCESS Phone interview with Billy our Talent Acquisition SpecialistInterview with Hafid our Director of Organic GrowthInterview with André our SEO Project Manager US Brian our Traffic Manager UKInterview with Guillaume our Chief Marketing OfficerInterview with Thibaud our CEOWHY SHOULD YOU JOIN US A meaningful job through hard work you will help avoid thousands of tons of electronic waste and fight against planned obsolescence It counts An attractive salary equity multiple benefits meal tickets health insurance etc parental benefits relocation package internal events etc Be in an environment where you can make a difference you will have the freedom to innovate and adopt new ideas Grow your career with a flexible career path Back Market can help you evolve A booming scale up our environment is rapidly growing in Europe the USA and in Asia We embrace work life balance which includes flexible working hours and the opportunity to work from home A lot of fun you will have the opportunity to work in a fast paced open minded and friendly environment Back Market is an Equal Opportunity Employer for any minority disability gender identity or sexual orientation

column3: Search Engine Optimization SEO Team Lead Manager f m d work from home
column11: Is This You You are currently working as a team lead in a digital marketing agency or you are running an in house team Things can get quite hectic as clients and team members turn over often Deadlines are always tight and the sales pressure is high You have spent one to many nights in front of your screen and you are looking for something new 2020 might have been the first time you worked from home and you found it very enjoyable You easily organized yourself and enjoyed the freedom to make your own schedule This is where Flow SEO comes in You Want MORE Creativity Flexibility Flow We are Flow SEO a remote native digital marketing agency with a focus on Berlin We have built our agency around the principles of flow that illusive state of being in the zone where we feel our best and perform our best We have given up on the hustle doctrine and have grown our agency organically by inbound marketing and referral Now founder Viola Eva is looking for an experienced and charismatic right hand to lead and manage the entire SEO team This is for you if You have been in the trenches did the hard work and have first hand experience of implementing successful SEO campaigns However now your passion has turned to building developing and managing teams You are a people s person that gets operations Nothing makes you happier than setting up smooth systems and great training opportunities that make your team members succeed You are looking for a job with flexible hours holidays where you can turn off notifications and weekends off You are a digital native You know Slack Asana Gsuite Ahrefs and SEMrush inside out or you know it will be easy for you to jump into new tools In short You are eager to make things happen and develop a powerful team whilst enjoying your private life hobbies and relationships Who We AreFlow SEO is a remote native digital marketing agency We are specialized in SEO for digital businesses such as software eCommerce and eLearning Our clients include MailCharts Gmelius Betterworks Love Stories TV Beekeeper or IBIS World We provide services such as technical analysis SEO driven content marketing strategies keyword research content calendars content briefings content optimization link acquisition as well as SEA Flow SEO founder Viola Eva is known from industry publication Search Engine Journal and public speaking at UnGagged Pubcon Search Marketing Summit Sydney WordCamp InOrbit MBSummit SEOkomm Tech Open Air and Webinale Viola Eva is passionate about digital entrepreneurship flow and mindful marketing As a marketing consultant and SEO she has worked with clients ranging from individual digital entrepreneurs to software companies to multinational corporations and government institutions We are committed to working in flow and ease as much as we can We thus challenge the notion of busyness instant notifications ever changing priorities and traditional models of scaling an agency We like to focus on what matters Great community deep work and peak performance We are a remote native agency and our team members live in Germany Austria Macedonia Serbia Switzerland and the USA We work asynchronously at your own schedule There won t be a beer fridge or a ping pong table but there will be the freedom to make your own schedule get creative set your own tasks and massively shape the growth of Flow SEO in the next few years The agency https www flow seo com Our blog https www flow seo com blog Press mentions https www flow seo com press Viola Eva https www linkedin com in viola eva Job DetailsFull time positionThe role will be mostly remote and asynchronous There will be ca 1 1 5 office coworking days per week in Berlin to brainstorm new ideas align and start new initiatives Salary to be discussed The range is 50 to 60k EUR per year based on experience Reports to Viola Eva founder marketing sales finance based in Berlin Manages currently 7 SEO team members all remote Success in the role means increased team happiness and productivity meeting all client deadlines successfully managing your own clients and supporting revenue growth through smooth operations Responsibilities and DutiesManage all SEO consultants as well as the backlink team currently 7 people all remoteDevelop SEO team through 1on1s and trainingProject manage our SEO and backlink campaigns in our project management tool AsanaOwn client deadlines and delivery of SEO workStreamline and improve SEO processes client communication and reportingSet up implement and train SEO team on the usage of new toolsAccount manage and execute the SEO work for 2 4 SEO clients ca 25 30 of your time to learn our process understand what we do and improve upon itSEO projects for clients as needed QualificationsNative level English Excellent self organization in a remote work environmentExcellent project management for a remote teamExcellent team development incl onboarding 1on1s and trainingExcellent campaign or client account managementGood practical SEO skills technical SEO driven content marketing on page optimization or backlink building Excellent ownership for results by being proactive finding solutions communicating openly introducing new ideas and improving our processes Excellent people skills active listening openness to feedback and self reflection Bonus SkillsGermanPublic speaking or videos e g webinars talks or podcastsActive on LinkedIn or looking to become active Next StepsPlease send your CV to viola flow seo com Please include a mandatory 2min Loom video with your face where you highlight one professional win that you celebrated in 2021 Cover letter not mandatory Culture fit interview We want to understand who you are how you tick and how you vibe with our culture and values Test task related to project planning and operations Paid with 200 EUR Skill interview We go deep into your experience with project and team management operations and managing remote teams Contract permanent employment with 6 months trial period Probezeit

column3: Content Writer
column11: Who We Are At Wunderman Thompson we exist to inspire growth for ambitious brands Part creative agency part consultancy and part technology company our experts provide end to end capabilities at a global scale to deliver inspiration across the entire brand and customer experience We are 20 000 strong in 90 markets around the world our people bring together creative storytelling diverse perspectives inclusive thinking and highly specialized vertical capabilities to drive growth for our clients We offer deep expertise across the entire customer journey including communications commerce consultancy CRM CX data production and technology Wunderman Thompson Germany is seeking an English Native Content Writer all genders You will create high quality target group oriented content for digital marketing channels from concise teasers to long copies for websites newsletters mailings whitepapers videos social media etc You pay attention to important factors of search engine optimization and user experience Besides being a fantastic marketing and content writer the ideal candidate is flexible efficient highly detailed and deadline driven You have a keen understanding of the type of content that fulfills on business objectives and client expectations Every good idea comes down to the right messaging and that responsibility falls largely on the shoulders of the writer A part of every WT creative s responsibility is to continue learning Whether it s learning a coding language sharpening your SEO skills or diving into becoming better at strategy part of your job will be growing your mind What You Bring 2 years in creative writing positionsYou have a degree in language marketing or communication sciences or journalisticsYou have already gained your first professional experience in the editorial areaYou have perfect knowledge of Englis spelling and grammarYou are characterized by creativity a distinctive sense for language and a profound text competence knowledge in the field of creating SEO texts is an advantageYou are reliable independent have a quick grasp and are a team player You are also happy to take the initiative if needed Curious We look forward to your application with an expressive portfolio At Wunderman Thompson we are committed to actively building a diverse equitable and inclusive workplace where everyone feels welcomed valued and heard and is treated with dignity and respect As leaders and creative partners across industries it is our responsibility to cultivate an environment reflective of our greatest asset our people We believe that this commitment inspires growth and delivers equitable outcomes for everyone as well as the clients and communities we serve Wunderman Thompson is a WPP agency For more personal information under the GDPR for purposes of recruitment and applications for employment

column3: Internship Marketing Strategy m f x at Rock Tech Lithium Inc
column11: We are a clean tech company powering the batteries for the electric vehicle EV revolution It s a new era The era of green energy Of electric cars The common denominator They all depend on batteries Lithium ion batteries to be exact And that s where we come in We produce clean lithium that is the superfuel of the battery age No lithium no batteries no electric cars no clean future And we make sure that our lithium products are treated right along the entire value chain from mine to battery and back to battery So we are the missing link in the clean mobility story Aufgaben You will be part of our Strategy Marketing Sustainability team in Berlin You will support strategic decision making be involved hands on with conception presentation assist senior management in deep dives and run your own special projects You will be joining a small highly skilled and seasoned team in a high growth environment at a key moment of the company s history And get an insight into every strategic part of the company from fundraising to trading high level partnership building and political dialogue The role offers a high degree of responsibility and the ability to hone entrepreneurial skills as well as a great learning opportunity as you will be working directly with senior team leads Tasks you will support and drive are You establish enhance and execute RCKs marketing strategy together with your team You work on a circular economy approach that represents our business model with a high focus on investor perception and relation You work on our corporate presentations collaborating closely with our CMO and the CEO officeYou help drive the OKR process across the company aligning all stakeholders around common goalsYou manage and drive your own modules that will have an impact on our company s mission to produce green lithium for the European EV revolution Qualifikation You have an academic background in business administration the humanities or social sciences and have a knack for strategic conceptual thinking You think on your feet pay attention to detail and enjoy working in a high paced environment where every day can be unlike the one beforeYou feel comfortable managing occasional high workloads and changing prioritiesYou have a genuine interest in and curiosity about the EV revolutionYou are a self starter with bias for action and excellence who likes to get operationally involved You convince with excellent skills in the microsoft suite specifically PowerPointYou bring 3 6 months of spare timeYou are business fluent in both German and English Benefits Come on board and help us to shape the era of green energy In addition you can expect from us Being part of an impact driven ambitious and international team with outstanding track records superb expertise and exceptional investorsAn attractive workplace in Berlin with hybrid working optionsExposure to senior management and the opportunity to learn from industry leadersCompetitive compensation Interested Then we look forward to hearing from you

column3: Senior Marketing Manager
column11: We are a VC backed stealth start up with the mission to bring online grocery delivery to ethnic communities across the globe Our founding team comes with experience from some of the fastest growing tech companies in Europe as well as strategy consulting Delivery Hero Tier WeFox BCG As we have launched our first operations and are now looking for people who want to shape our product and tech strategy from day 1 Join us to make grocery delivery accessible to everyone We are backed by Atlantic Food Labs and part of its food portfolio network which includes no others than Gorillas Choco or Infarm We are building an outstanding team with skilled members across all domains and backgrounds We focus on building a diverse and inclusive company culture and aim to become a global leader in online grocery retail Join us now as our first Senior Marketing Manager m f x in our office in Berlin Mitte YOUR ROLE As a Senior Marketing Manager m f x you will be an integral part of our go to market phase You will act as the right hand of the founder team and drive key initiatives in operations product finance fundraising and marketing Hence you will get involved in all aspects of building an early stage high growth business You will participate in key strategy meetings and engage directly with investors advisors business partners and most importantly customers Everything you work on in this role will shape the future of a young mission driven company WHY JOIN A unique opportunity to work with an early stage and high growth e commerce business in Europe Spice up your career with our focus on becoming an international market leader there are many chances to grow within the team upwards and sidewaysBecome part of the 150 companies strong portfolio and Atlantic network with inspiring peersA once in a lifetime chance to work in an inspiring and challenging environment culture and develop your commercial skills for the digital future of retailEnjoy an amazing team experience be prepared for the after work beers on the rooftop of our office in the heart of Berlin Your Task Responsibilities You will be our first marketing expert in the team and thus will be a key sparrings partner for all things marketing to the founder team Overlook performance for ASO SEM Display SEO App marketing and Paid social Work on cross channel collaboration between search and display channels Lead CRM and Online marketing teams to drive growth Define the overall marketing strategy and budget in close collaboration with the founder team and drive the execution to deliver business growth at a massive scale Develop an authentic well targeted global DTC brand and lead the international expansion to capitalize on market opportunities across geographies and channels Implement execute and optimize all relevant performance marketing and analytics tools to continuously evaluate and enhance channel campaign and content performance Conduct market research and competitor analysis to define our target market and to constantly refine our product value proposition Define a clear and inspiring content marketing strategy that builds trust and credibility to facilitate long term customer acquisition YOUR PROFILE You have experience in a leading marketing role in a fast growing DTC food start up You have experience in developing market entry strategies and driving international expansion You have a strong track record of developing optimizing and scaling performance marketing channels like Google Adwords and social media performance marketing You have an entrepreneurial mindset exceptional analytical skills and a deep understanding of data analytics and attribution models You have experience in display cross channel and micro influencer campaigns You are fluent in German C1 and fluent in English C1 in oral and written communication Fluency in Turkish Arabic or Farsi is of great advantage OUR MINDSET As a part of a fast growing startup you can benefit from a steep learning curve from day one with a high career growth trajectory We love seeing our crew blossom growing with us With a transparent company culture stunning team spirit we ensure a dynamic international environment welcome to anyone Plus our flexible working arrangements support people at different stages in their lives We celebrate diversity are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees If you want to build something you are proud of you believe in the vision we want you on the team We are an equal opportunity employer which means we do not discriminate on the basis of race color religion marital status age national origin ancestry physical or mental disability medical condition pregnancy genetic information gender sexual orientation gender identity or expression We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees

column3: Senior Marketing Manager
column11: We are GimmeMore a rapidly growing company from Berlin with over 12 million unique players per month that enjoy our challenging quizzes personal assessment tests and other online tests and games As we are rapidly expanding our product portfolio market reach and general marketing budgets we are looking for a Senior Marketing Manager to join our team Your Responsibilities Define marketing strategies for our various product verticals Create and execute performance marketing plans with our marketing acquisition team Set up marketing budget plans for our different product verticals Continuously monitor performance optimize our marketing campaigns and discover new opportunities for growth Test new product features in various marketing channels What you bring to the table 3 years relevant experience preferably working with digital products Strong knowledge of performance marketing and various online marketing channels Strong analytical thinking and a strong understanding of KPIs You like testing and finding new creative approaches You enjoy analyzing user funnels and finding out how to engage our users and transform them into repeating customers Why you should join and work with us Benefit from a competitive salary and company performance bonus scheme Work in a flexible environment you can balance onsite work and home office Socialize with your colleagues during our fun team events company paid lunches and breakfasts Work in a modern office in the center of Berlin where you can enjoy fresh fruits drinks and snacks for free We care about your development and future and will provide you with an educational budget sponsor your gym membership and sign you up to our companies private pension scheme for free What are you waiting for Apply now and join our international team passionate about creating great digital products

column3: JUNIOR SEO MANAGER F M D
column11: Our team needs more great colleagues Does the development and marketing of innovative natural hemp based products to help people stay in balance sound exciting to you Is working in a young ambitious company with a diverse team your thing Are you looking for a challenge in an exciting and growing market Then you ve come to the right place YOUR TERRAIN You support us in the planning and implementation of our new SEO strategy in close cooperation with external agenciesYou are responsible for the optimization of the SEO content in the webshops of our brands Vaay This Place and support other exciting projectsYou are responsible for the maintenance of the content in our Content Management System CMS You collaborate with internal e g Content Design Tech team and external stakeholdersYou conduct competition trend market analysis and derive target oriented measuresYou are responsible for monitoring evaluating relevant KPIs with common SEO tools like Google Search Console Google Analytics etc How You Convince Us You can identify yourself with our mission to revolutionize the European cannabis market and want to make your contributionYou have great German speaking and writing skills and English speaking skillsYou are a team player with an outcome oriented mindsetYou are passionate about the world of SEO and keep yourself up to date with the latest onsite and offsite optimization strategiesYou have successfully completed your studies in the field of marketing business communications business informatics media economics or a similar field of study You ideally have first experiences in the field of search engine optimizationYou ideally have first experiences with SEO toolsYou have ideally worked with a CMS beforeYou have strong conceptual analytical skills and are not afraid of numbers What You Can Look Forward To We provide flexible working hours in an innovative and agile working environmentWe cherish uncomplicated interaction with each other in flat hierarchies and with short decision pathsWe foster an open culture and agile way of working with a lot of space to create and develop ideasWe pay fair based on your qualifications and experienceWe provide internal and external development opportunities because stagnation means a step backwardsWe live an error culture with the motto Fail fast because mistakes make us better if we handle it transparently and learn from itWe organize team events for a lot of fun besides work What You Should Know Sanity Care GmbH with its two brands VAAY and This Place is the B2C unit of the fast growing cannabis start up Sanity Group based in Berlin The brands of Sanity Care GmbH develop and sell lifestyle and cosmetic products based on natural cannabinoids such as CBD and other herbal ingredients VAAY for example stands for CBD and hemp based products to promote mindfulness balance and well being as part of a healthy lifestyle This Place is the functional natural cosmetics brand with natural wellness and beauty products Our goal is to harness the full potential of the cannabis plant and to explore and harness more cannabinoids other than CBD in the future SOUNDS GOOD We are looking forward to receiving your application

column3: Senior Growth Project Manager f m x
column11: About us Altitude is an agency that focuses on the combination of digital marketing and creative content production We work for both digital native companies as well as established brands that want to increase their digital presence What do all of our clients have in common They aim for achieving ambitious business results with a combination of performance and creative We believe that both have to come from a single source in order to be successful nowadays What you will do You lead various growth projects strategically and operationally and are the face to the clientYou break down business goals into clear marketing to dos develop a holistic project plan and ensure the goal driven execution of itYou manage an internal project team of various experts performance marketing design content production data and reporting and ensure an efficient use of their resourcesYou support projects operationally whenever needed e g funnel iterations creative briefings performance control and take full responsibility for the overall project successYou take the role as an active hands on growth lead for all your projects Your Profile 4 years of experience in the field of online marketing growthHaving a good understanding of the most relevant marketing channels Familiar with tracking tools like Google Analytics and general tech savvyExperience in fast growth companies digital projectsVery well structured analytical and have a strong eye for detailDriven hungry and an aspiration to continuously improveHigh level of empathy while enjoying to work in ambitious teamsGenerally having fun working on challenging projects as well as celebrating their success Why Altitude At Altitude we strongly believe in the power of teams We aim for a combination of complementary senior profiles in the field of content creation digital marketing and strategy that lead to the most efficient and effective way of working While achieving strong work results is our primary goal having fun at work and enjoying each other s company comes with it without saying If you like being challenged and working in an ambitious work environment Altitude is the right place for you to learn contribute and celebrate your team s success PS We are based in Berlin and are happy to enjoy our breaks on one our sunny balcony

column3: MARKETING MANAGER CONVERSION RATE OPTIMIZATION F M D
column11: Sanity Group aims to improve the quality of life for people in Europe through the meaningful use of cannabinoids We believe that there s a lot of untapped potential in nature that can contribute to a healthier way of life for many people In addition to medicine our focus is also on cannabinoid based wellbeing and cosmetic products In parallel Sanity Group is also working and researching new medical products innovative dosage forms and technological products services to further develop the cannabis industry Our mission is to help unlock the full potential of the cannabis plant and its ingredients in order to make them accessible for people YOUR TERRAIN You collaborate with different departments and stakeholders Tech SEO Performance Marketing Customer Service Content Design to ensure a consistent content and user experience and to optimize each conversion path throughout the different online user journeys on our websites and landing pagesYou analyze and synthesize data to understand how our target groups navigate our websites and and you identify opportunities for growth and scaleYou create hypotheses set up test roadmaps and conduct A B and multivariate tests to continuously optimize the UX ensuring adherence to relevant KPIsYou quickly identify and understand key conversion rate optimization issues and work cross functionally to speed up the hypothesis to solution implementation loopYou ensure that all test results are documented and visually prepared discuss your findings with all relevant stakeholders and derive recommendations for new and innovative ideas to further improve website and content development How You Convince Us You can identify yourself with our mission to revolutionize the European cannabis market and want to make your contributionYou stand behind our people first culture and can identify with our values Act entrepreneurial Be transparent and Continuously improve You have proven experience in UX website and content analytics and optimization ideally in a fast growing and agile environmentYou have a data driven approach to making decisionsYou have experience in setting up and conducting A B test for website optimizationYou have an understanding of SEO SEM and inbound marketing best practicesYou are used to work with common web analytics e g Google Analytics Testing tools eg Optimizely and VWO and SEO tools e g Searchmetrics Your organisational skills are excellent and you easily oversee and hold all strings of projects togetherYou have outstanding analytical and problem solving abilitiesYou have excellent communication interpersonal and presentation skillsYou are fluent in English and possess a good German knowledge What You Can Look Forward To We provide flexible working hours in an innovative and agile working environmentWe cherish uncomplicated interaction with each other in flat hierarchies and with short decision pathsWe foster an open culture and agile way of working with a lot of space to create and develop ideasWe pay fair based on your qualifications and experienceWe provide internal and external development opportunities because stagnation means a step backwardsWe live an error culture with the motto Fail fast because mistakes make us better if we handle it transparently and learn from itWe organize team events for a lot of fun besides work What You Should Know Sanity Group was founded in 2018 by Finn Age Hänsel and Fabian Friede The company now employs a team of over 90 employees in Germany at its headquarters in Berlin and its production facility near Frankfurt am Main Sanity Group brands include Vayamed pharmaceuticals Sanity Science research and production Belfry Medical medical devices VAAY CBD products and This Place natural cosmetics The company is supported strategically and financially by venture capital companies such as HV Capital as well as by various business angels such as music producer Will i am TV entertainer Klaas Heufer Umlauf football player Mario Götze and model Stefanie Giesinger SOUNDS GOOD We are looking forward to receiving your application

column3: Senior SEO Analyst
column11: Who we are Are you passionate about organic growth enjoy problem solving and taking ownership for high impact initiatives Come and join our SEO team on our hyper growth journey in Europe Our European and global SEO team is responsible for all organic search traffic We are building a world class organic search practice combining a mix of product excellence to build features that engage organic visitors technical marketing to identify new user intents and opportunities and content science to create high quality content at scale As a senior SEO analyst you will own the SEO strategy execution and results of our European business This entails identifying new opportunities monitoring performance deepening our understanding of SEO levers and driving the roadmap of features tools and tests we launch every month You will collaborate with a dedicated team of content product and engineering experts covering a broad scope In a given quarter you might find yourself launching features that boost semantic richness investigating Google algo changes optimizing the creation of programmatic pages or advising the organic growth strategy of a billion dollar business In no time you will be driving millions of new organic visits and have gained a uniquely valuable expertise Currently operating our European business in the UK and Germany we are heavily investing into new initiatives partners and new European markets to fuel further growth For you this means plenty of learning room to develop and take on additional responsibilities We support you with our friendly highly collaborative and no ego culture dedicated training programs and of course a competitive performance oriented compensation About Marketing In Europe At Wayfair Marketing at Wayfair is a key growth driver and critical enabler of our overall success Our team is a diverse inclusive and international group of customer advocates who enjoy moving fast and taking creative risks Our Berlin based team owns and operates a full suite of marketing channels in Europe including TV Facebook Instagram Google Email Direct Mail and more What you will do Identify new traffic opportunities and unmet user intentsBuild a roadmap of new features improving organic landing experiences and rankings and embed these in our global SEO OKRs Design test plans to deepen our understanding of SEO levers Apply advanced models like NLP to improve page quality and relevance at scaleLead the research and insight generation activities including competitor analysis site audits opportunity analysis content strategy merchandise planograms and moreOwn measurement and performance reporting for your scopeCollaborate closely with our global SEO team dedicated SEO Engineering Storefront Engineering Data Engineering and others to co drive innovation What you will need Bachelors Masters degree with strong academic record ideally in a quantitative field of study Proven ability to handle multiple priorities and learn quickly2 3 years work experience with a track record of delivering results in fast paced settings e g e commerce management consulting tech companies work experience in SEO is a definite plusDemonstrated structured problem solving skills great attention to detail and experience with hypothesis driven approaches to complex problemsStrong quantitative and data analysis skills at least advanced Excel skills and experience with analyzing big data sets in SQL a second language especially Python R are an advantage Fundamental understanding of HTML CSS JavaScript and how the web worksStrong business sense hunger for driving results that reflect clearly in our KPIsOpen mindset collaborative working style and strong can do attitude and make things happen in a fast paced environmentAnswer first and specific communication style and strong persuasion skills Excellent English language skills a second European language especially German is an advantage Benefits Highly competitive compensation packages comprising of Base Salary Bonuses and Equity Full ownership of your wellbeing with our unlimited Personal Time Off Paid volunteering work Contribution to private pension Commuting schemes car bike public transport Extensive internal training platform Free access to LinkedIn e learning courses and programs Comprehensive financial scheme for Learning Development opportunities and continuous education Access to German language courses Health Sport memberships Virtual child care programs and support Global Wellbeing Program Employee discount for Wayfair purchases Corporate benefits About Wayfair Inc Wayfair is one of the world s largest online destinations for the home Whether you work in our global headquarters in Boston or Berlin or in our warehouses or offices throughout the world we re reinventing the way people shop for their homes Through our commitment to industry leading technology and creative problem solving we are confident that Wayfair will be home to the most rewarding work of your career If you re looking for rapid growth constant learning and dynamic challenges then you ll find that amazing career opportunities are column3: Senior B2B Marketing Manager f m d
column11: We at MonitorFish GmbH digitalize the fish farming companies making the farm management sustainable transparent and animal friendly Our mission is to empower the farmers through the use of innovative technologies and help them reach their own goals Based in Berlin MonitorFish is a multicultural team of 20 innovation driven experts seed financed looking to revolutionize a whole industry Honesty and reliability form the core values of our amazing team Now we are looking for an experienced and committed Senior B2B Marketing Manager f m d to help us grow our company For sure we will provide you with a fun and challenging work environment www monitorfish com Your role Developing and executing a multichannel multi country strategy for our brand and product Monitoring and evaluating all channels and relevant KPIs Owning the customer s journey to nurture leads and deliver them to sales Conducting market research studies and market analyses to gather key brand and product data Collaborating with stakeholders within the company to validate campaign goals and communicate campaign progress Budget planning Requirements A degree in business administration marketing and communications or similar field of study At least 5 years of proven experience in brand and product marketing Within the IoT Biotech MedTech Aquaculture industry is a plus An entrepreneurial mindset can do attitude and a desire to inspire and drive change The ability to work independently and bring analytical and conceptual creative thinking to the table Your work style is structured problem solving and results oriented You can express yourself fluently in English and German both verbally and in writing Benefits A competitive salary with a target based bonus option Flexible working hours Hybrid working model office and remote An agile working environment with lots of space to grow You make pioneering contributions in improving resource efficiency and mitigrating climate change in agriculture sector

clients apps and lifecycle marketing to enable Phiture s clients sustainable and strong growth What you ll do Consulting our clients based on their growth opportunities and challenges Managing several client accounts and budgets Devise new methods and strategies for improving the team processes and productivity Execute tests collect and analyze data identify trends and insights Help to achieve maximum ROI in performance marketing campaigns Track report and analyze campaigns in depth by understanding the core problems drivers of change Effectively manage campaign expenses by staying on budget appropriately estimating monthly costs and reconciling any discrepancies that may arise Optimizing creative assets by working closely with our design team Work closely with our Data Engineering team to develop cutting edge technology solutions Continually expand and optimize performance by looking into threats and opportunities Research the relationship between paid and organic placements and cannibalization of organic traffic by paid placements Research and analyze competitors industry trends and marketsProduce relevant content and data driven articles for our Services knowledge base and Facebook advertisingOther social ads DSPs SEA or programmatic experience preferredYou are well versed in mobile marketing specifically acquisitionYou like to be up to date on current trends best column3: Affiliate Performance Marketing Manager f m d
column11: Spark Networks SE is a leading global dating company with a widening portfolio of premium freemium apps These brands include Zoosk EliteSingles JDate Christian Mingle eDarling JSwipe Attractive World and Silver Singles to name a few Formed in 2017 through the merger of Affinitas GmbH and Spark Networks Inc the company has a presence in 29 countries worldwide and is publicly listed on the NYSE American exchange under the ticker symbol LOV The firm continues its steady growth and we are now looking to strengthen our Marketing Team with an Affiliate Performance Marketing Manager f m d position at our Berlin headquarters As Affiliate Performance Marketing Manager your mission will be to Be responsible for the development and optimization of assigned markets out of our 24 geos and multi brand portfolio Be in charge of planning strategizing and controlling of the assigned budget based on defined KPIs Working across departments including Design Product and Business Analytics and will take over a representative role of the partnership channel internally as well as externally Plan strategize and control 6 digit affiliate budgets based on the defined KPIs Track results and have a bias towards action for optimization and growth Building relationships and striking partnerships with external publishers direct cooperation marketing agencies networks and other potential partners Competences we are looking for You are a confident and strong communicator Negotiation comes second nature to you You are a motivated self starter and love to take ownership of processes and projects You learn quickly and work independently You bring a sense of humor to your day to day and are a team player Requirements You have proven experience in Performance Marketing ideally in Affiliate and or E Mail marketing additional experience in other online marketing channels Social Display SEM is a plus You are naturally analytical and have a passion for working with numbers You are familiar with Marketing Attribution and know how to work efficiently with tracking tools You speak English fluently other languages are a plus Benefits HYBRID APPROACH TO WORK We believe in the magic of human interaction not only when it comes to finding the love of your life but also when it comes to finding the team or colleague of your life We hence have employees coming to our vibrant Berlin office space twice a week to network enjoy social events collaborate with other teams brainstorm innovate and feel the magic of Spark No Zoom Call can replace a whiteboard full of ideas or a drink with colleagues right For the remainder of the week employees are free to choose where they would like to work from and what space caters best to their strengths and needs HEALTH WELLBEING 27 holidays p a Flexi time where possible Urban Sports Club subsidized membership Weekly online Yoga Zoomba classes and Back courseCalm App Mindful Movement TRAINING DEVELOPMENT Online German language class A1 or Leadership Circle seriesCareer development plans LIFE LOVE Relocation support visa and registration Company pension 15 company contribution Cooperation with Berlin nursery Kita chain no guarantee for free spot BVG ticket discount 5 discount for annual BVG public transport ticket Free account on our dating platformsEmployee discount program in collaboration with hundreds of brands A friendly working atmosphere with free drinks lots of food company parties team events and great colleagues from all over the world check out our Career Video to meet your future colleagues Spark Networks is proud to be an equal opportunity employer We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for our employees Any hiring decision is based on qualification skills abilities and the specific needs of Spark Networks with regard to a given position See why Spark Networks employees love where they work check out our Glassdoor reviews and kununu reviews Let Spark Networks be forward to receive your application
