column3: Junior Marketing Manager
column11: Job Description Unser Partner Für den Standort Berlin suchen wir ab sofort eine n Junior Online Marketing Manager in Vollzeit Diese Aufgaben warten auf dich Along with our Online Marketing Managers you plan develop and optimize wide ranging Paid Search Campaigns PPC for our retail clientsYou carefully analyze campaign performances and evaluate and interpret performance related KPIsYou prepare accurate reports and present the results in convincing presentationsYou continuously optimize and assure the quality control of campaigns with regards to defined client goalsYou make ads even more efficient by researching keywords and market trendsAfter having learned the PPC basics you specialize in technical topics and share your knowledge with the whole department Diese Benefits werden dir geboten Appraisal Interviews In your regular appraisal interviews you ll learn more about your strengths explore areas of growth and discuss your career development Be up to date Discover the latest trends by attending one of our meet ups with industry experts from other leading market players or learn from our shared conference experiences Company Socials We re all about combining work and fun Every year we get the whole company together for a company festival to discuss strategy over barbecue and beer Development plan At Crealytics you ll never stop learning which is why we offer an elaborate professional development plan Follow our set career programs or adapt them to your individual career goals Dogs allowed Don t leave poor Fido at home Our office is dog friendly Feedback culture You have an idea for how we can improve Share it in our annual employee surveys or in your end of year one on ones Fitness A healthy mind starts with a healthy body We offer our employees a selection of partnerships with fitness studios and sports memberships Flexible working hours Not a morning person Want to be home when your kids get off school We understand Flexible working hours allow you to pursue a work life balance that suits your needs Food and drinks Craving vitamins or caffeine Just stop by our kitchen and grab some fresh fruit a nice cup of cappuccino or enjoy a relaxing beer after work Game rooms Need a quick break Head over to the game room and challenge one of your fellow Crealytees to a set of table tennis a game of foosball or try your luck on our video game console Headhunting bonus Inspire your friends family neighbors or the people you meet in a park and get up to 3000 if we hire a new Crealytee referred by you International environment Not from around here Neither are most of us We ve got employees from over 40 countries helping us run international campaigns all over the world International opportunities Internationalize your career If you find a Crealytics job in another country we ll help you move there Language courses Want to brush up on your language skills Give one of our free language classes a try Lunch roulette This is a fantastic opportunity to get in touch with all your colleagues Everyone interested will be randomly sorted into small groups to go out for lunch together Onboarding mentorship From day one you ll be assigned your very own mentor They will act as your guide answering all your questions as you settle into life at Crealytics Orientation week Get off to a great start The Crealytics orientation week is an excellent opportunity to learn more about Crealytics explore our products and meet the management team Pension scheme In addition to the statutory pension scheme we offer you a non binding retirement plan for your specific situation subsidized by Crealytics of course Relocation Paid accommodation as well as experienced relocation buddies guide you through your visa application Teambuilding Bond with your team mates with an activity you ll all enjoy Each team gets a yearly incentive budget to do whatever they want Training We offer more than 60 wide ranging internal and external trainings and workshops Improve existing skills or learn something entirely new Transparency You deserve to know how we re doing as a company Join our quarterly meetings and strategy sessions to find out about current business figures product updates and the company roadmap Requirements Ideally you ve gained first hand experience in Online Marketing where you cultivated a strong interest in Search Engine Advertising SEA PPC You ve successfully completed your studies in marketing business administration or a related fieldYou love to crunch numbers and provide solid Microsoft Excel skillsYou speak German and English fluently any additional languages are a big plusDetail oriented you re a self starter who craves responsibility

Netherlands and Nordics Nurture qualify and build the sales opportunity pipeline for the mentioned regions Calling and emailing marketing generated inbound leads to qualify and schedule meetings for Business Economics Marketing Tourism other curriculum will also be considered Previous work experience in sales or business development will be preferred Previous work experience using Excel powerpoint and ideally a CRM software Eager to learn adapt and work in a relaxed but fast paced environment Excellent time management skills and team orientation Excellent communication and interpersonal skills with the ability and skills to develop relationships quickly both internally within MEETYOO and externally with prospects customers Fluent in English German is a plus WE OFFER A free beverages and fresh fruit and that s only the beginning WOULD YOU LIKE TO BE PART OF MEETYOO

column3: Junior Ecommerce Marketplace Manager Amazon Ebay f m d
column11: We are looking for a Junior Marketplace Manager that wants to embody our FRESH values Focus Respectful Reliable Energy Sustainability Honesty Join us to build a scalable reCommerce logistics platform that helps save millions of products from destruction generating economic value and saving the environment Let s disrupt the reCommerce industry and build a long lasting company together Every year more than 20 of retail goods are returned or simply never sell This creates billions of costs for retailers and tons of unnecessary waste for the environment Our mission is to make retail more sustainable by optimizing returns and overstock management we turn waste into sustainable profits To accomplish this we built an innovative system throughout the whole reverse supply chain to resell returns and overstock to new customers and consumers redirecting every item to its next best home Aufgaben We are looking for someone with 1 2 years of experience in handling B2C eCommerce channels specifically Amazon and Ebay You will be targeting consumers mainly in the DACH region but also in other European countries We expect a professional with autonomy and self accountability full of creative ideas and a great attitude You will thrive with us if you bring along an entrepreneurial mindset that fits an exciting and agile working strategy Qualifikation Important for us Languages German Full Working Proficiency Native and English Advanced Native additional languages are a plus Work location Berlin Personality Value and vision driven ability to embody the overall vision and mission of the company Culture fit Taking advantage of working with both experienced team members as well as young agile founders Hands on attitude if there needs to be work done it will be done Interview and in office assessment day Your Profile Qualifications 1 3 years of experience in the marketing area of an e commerce company tech startup or corporate Additional experience in Amazon and Ebay is a plus Passionate about online marketing especially performance marketing but also content marketing Technology affine with knowledge of tools like Amazon Seller Central Ebay Seller Portal Mail Chimp Google Ads Facebook Ads Google Analytics CRM Benefits A small and dynamic team Close advice of experienced advisors Flat hierarchy and open communication Being part of an impactful company column3: SEO Analyst
column11: Who we are Are you passionate about organic growth enjoy problem solving and taking ownership for high impact initiatives Come and join our SEO team on our hyper growth journey in Europe Our European and global SEO team is responsible for all organic search traffic We are building a world class organic search practice combining a mix of product excellence to build features that engage organic visitors technical marketing to identify new user intents and opportunities and content science to create high quality content at scale As a SEO analyst you will execute the SEO strategy and own the SEO results of our European business This entails identifying new opportunities monitoring performance deepening our understanding of SEO levers and driving the roadmap of features tools and tests we launch every month You learn fast from your more experienced colleagues and collaborate directly with a dedicated team of content product and engineering experts In a given quarter you might find yourself launching features that boost semantic richness investigating Google algo changes optimizing the creation of programmatic pages or advising the organic growth strategy of a billion dollar business In no time you will be driving millions of new organic visits and have gained a uniquely valuable expertise Currently operating our European business in the UK and Germany we are heavily investing into new initiatives partners and new European markets to fuel further growth For you this means plenty of learning room to develop and take on additional responsibilities as you grow in your career at Wayfair We support you with our friendly highly collaborative and no ego culture dedicated training programs and of course a competitive performance oriented compensation About Marketing In Europe At Wayfair Marketing at Wayfair is a key growth driver and critical enabler of our overall success Our team is a diverse inclusive and international group of customer advocates who enjoy moving fast and taking creative risks Our Berlin based team owns and operates a full suite of marketing channels in Europe including TV Facebook Instagram Google Email Direct Mail and more What you will do Identify new traffic opportunities and unmet user intentsHelp to build a roadmap of new features improving organic landing experiences and rankings Embed these in our global SEO OKRsDesign test plans to deepen our understanding of SEO levers Apply advanced models like NLP to improve page quality and relevance at scaleLead the research and insight generation activities including competitor analysis site audits opportunity analysis content strategy merchandise planograms and moreOwn measurement and performance reporting for your scopeCollaborate closely with our global SEO team dedicated SEO Engineering Storefront Engineering Data Engineering and others to co drive innovation Apply what you have learned in university and previous jobs internships and very quickly acquire an in depth knowledge all aspects of SEO What you will need Bachelors Masters degree with strong academic record ideally in a quantitative field of study Proven ability to handle multiple priorities and learn quicklySome work experience incl internships with a track record of delivering results in fast paced settings e g e commerce management consulting tech companies work experience in SEO is a definite plusDemonstrated structured problem solving skills great attention to detail and experience with hypothesis driven approaches to complex problemsStrong quantitative and data analysis skills at least advanced Excel skills and experience with analyzing big data sets in SQL a second language especially Python R are an advantage Fundamental understanding of HTML CSS JavaScript and how the web worksStrong business sense hunger for driving results that reflect clearly in our KPIsOpen mindset collaborative working style and strong can do attitude and make things happen in a fast paced environmentAnswer first and specific communication style and strong persuasion skills Excellent English language skills a second European language especially German is an advantage What We ll Gladly Offer Highly competitive compensation packages comprising of Base Salary Bonuses and Equity Full ownership of your wellbeing with our unlimited Personal Time Off Paid volunteering work Contribution to private pension Commuting schemes car bike public transport Extensive internal training platform Free access to LinkedIn e learning courses and programs Comprehensive financial scheme for Learning Development opportunities and continuous education Access to German language courses Health Sport memberships Virtual child care programs and support Global Wellbeing Program Employee discount for Wayfair purchases Corporate benefits About Wayfair Inc Wayfair is one of the world s largest online destinations for the home Whether you work in our global headquarters in Boston or Berlin or in our warehouses or offices throughout the world we re reinventing the way people shop for their homes Through our commitment to industry leading technology and creative problem solving we are confident that Wayfair will be home to the most rewarding work of your career If you re looking for rapid growth constant learning and dynamic challenges then you ll find that amazing career opportunities are knocking No matter who you are Wayfair is a place you can call home We re a community of innovators risk takers and trailblazers who celebrate our differences and know column3: Performance Marketing Manager d f m
column11: Do you like ads So do we In fact Performance Marketing d f m is currently one of our main traffic drivers This is why we need some more talents to add to our awesome team We re looking for a Performance Marketing Manager to help us get the most out of our advertising budgets This person will report to the Head of Performance Marketing and will be part of our centralized Marketing department that supports all our brands Your challenge Take charge of the full paid advertising process Plan create analyze optimize and report adsGet the best results out of our performance channels with a focus on Facebook Instagram and SEMConceptualize run and document experiments that aim to continuously improve resultsAnalyze data to find the best setup for our automated prospecting and retargeting campaignsReport back results to the brand stakeholders and together with them come up with exciting new ad ideasWork closely with our inhouse creative team to make sure we always run the most engaging ads About you At least 2 years of hands on experience in performance marketing preferably in an e commerce environmentFacebook and or Google Ads hold no more secrets for you and you ve been responsible for 6 digit budgets beforeProven success with optimizing towards both revenue and retention KPIsGreat analytical skills excel sheets make you happy and you don t shy away from complex topics like attributionGood understanding of common performance marketing tools such as Google Analytics FB Business manager etc Bonus points for experience with one of these channels Affiliate display native advertisingPlus points if your German is at least at B1 level What Realtainment can offer you An innovative fast growing company with significant investments A 1200 sqm office space with a feel good factor A platform to bring out the creative and fun side in you by participating in our awesome events like ArtNight PlantNight BakeNight and ShakeNight Open minded and ambitious colleagues who are looking forward to taking off with you and celebrating success at exuberant team events We have an authentic feedback culture constructive and open which always focuses on promoting your personal development and growth Did we spark your interest to join a challenge in an ambitious creative and fast growing company We connect people with varied events that offer a high entertainment factor and where everyone learns something new More than 80 employees and a network of over 900 workshop leaders give their best every day to build Europe s leading platform for creative experiences As a team we attach great importance to being ourselves and to doing exactly what drives us every day To further revolutionize the way people get together We build teams that challenge the status quo grow as a unit and bring the importance of interpersonal relationships alongside with our unique products We live with diversity and equal opportunities In our teams we welcome every applicant regardless of gender ethnic origin religion age sexual identity disability or other grounds of discrimination Personal formulations in the job advertisement are to be considered gender neutral

column3: Senior SEO Manager d f m
column11: Our story Every year millions of people are either filing their taxes in fear or giving up on their tax refund altogether We re working on fixing that Our intuitive app enables anyone regardless of education or background to file their taxes with newfound confidence Spread across Berlin and Madrid Team Taxfix is a compassionate group of solution finders We speak our minds openly and with 350 professionals from 45 different nationalities we re rich in ideas and voices In four years we ve raised over 100 million euros in funding and helped people reclaim more than 900 million euros Your challenge As our Senior SEO Manager within the Content Team you ll have the opportunity to help shape the future of SEO strategy at Taxfix Reporting to our Content Lead and collaborating with stakeholders across the organisation you ll implement your vision to drive organic growth and help bring Taxfix and tax filing empowerment to the masses Your responsibilities Full ownership of the SEO channel s strategy and execution Work with content lead to develop SEO targets and report on progress to key cross functional stakeholders Drive growth through SEO content working with internal teams in local markets to optimise keyword performance Conduct keyword research to define high potential video content and optimise YouTube SEO performance and Google video visibility Monitor and improve domain authority via link marketing activities working with agencies in our various markets Work closely with engineering to monitor and improve our site speed and website architecture Work closely with engineering and analytics teams to automate SEO content production processes wherever possible Your profile 3 5 years of experience with SEO and content marketing in a high growth environment Experience with the full range of SEO disciplines from on page and technical SEO to off page SEO Experience with SEO tools Analytics Search Console Searchmetrics Sistrix Ahrefs Screaming Frog etc Experience working with stakeholders and agencies to achieve your goals and objectives Experience working with product and engineering to define and scope complex technical projects like page speed improvements Experience with YouTube SEO is considered a plus Fluent in English with a basic understanding of German Knowledge of French and Italian is considered a plus Why Taxfix A chance to do meaningful people centric work with an international team of passionate professionals Holistic wellbeing with free mental health coaching sessions yoga and a discounted membership to Urban Sports Club A monthly allowance to spend on home support services including childcare housekeeping pet sitting tutoring and elderly care Employee stock options for all employees because everyone deserves to benefit from the success they help to create Dedicated relocation and visa support for those that need it Choose to work from home or our modern office when needed plus healthy drinks and snacks when you do come in 27 annual vacation days and flexible working hours Full trust to take ownership of your work in a flat hierarchy where feedback is encouraged and expected A generous learning budget to support your personal and professional development and guidance from our internal L D experts Work from abroad for up to one month every year Just align with your team and then enjoy your trip Plenty of opportunities to socialise as a team In addition to internal meetups our international team hosts regular get togethers virtually and in person when possible Free tax declaration filing of course through the Taxfix app and internal support for all personal tax related questions Have a four legged friend in your life We re happy to have dogs join us in the office Excited So are we Learn more about Team Taxfix on our blog and get a glimpse of our culture below At Taxfix we believe that incredible things happen when you have a wealth of perspectives and experiences We re proudly committed to equal employment and development opportunities no matter your gender race religion age sexual orientation colour disability or place of origin To help mitigate any potential unconscious biases we ask that you refrain from including your picture age or marital status on your CV Let your experiences speak for themselves Not sure if you meet all the requirements for this role Please apply anyways You might bring something special to the team that we hadn t previously considered

column3: Media Buyer Leipzig region remote f m x
column11: Job Description Our pioneering team of marketing experts uses data driven insights to run efficient performance marketing and improve the customer journey We operate all acquisition marketing and conversion optimization activities fully in house giving you the best environment for a steep learning curve In your new role as TV Offline Marketing Manager you will analyze and optimize the media performance of our TV radio OOH and print campaigns for our largest C2B brand wirkaufendeinauto de and its European sister brands as well as our retail brand Autohero You would like to experience our dynamic atmosphere 100 from your home office whether from Düsseldorf Leipzig Mannheim or any other city in Germany and still have a big impact from day one Then find out what awaits you What You Can Expect Identify the best offline marketing opportunities to boost the brand awareness as well as customer acquisition for our online car buying brand Autohero while building up strong relations in the media industryBe responsible for planning booking and evaluating performance driven offline marketing campaigns in TV radio OOH and printConduct data driven analysis by connecting media KPIs with core business data using our industry leading toolsControl TV media distribution during the campaign proactively push adjustments in direct collaboration with TV stations and or our media agencyCollaborate with our Creative Production department to support the creative development process based on data driven insights What You Have Covered Graduated from university and relevant experience in offline marketing either in an e commerce company or a media agencyStrong analytical skills a data driven mindset and the interest in taking on analytical challenges by diving deeply into big sets of data using ExcelYou feel comfortable in a fast paced environment and you like to be challenged to increase your learning curveYour high level of attention to detail and your structured mindset enables you to keep track of multiple aspects of campaigns and projectsHighly motivated to grow further and learn in the field of brand building by openly testing new ideas and challenging status quo constantlyYou are perfectly fluent in English and another European language What We Offer You Once a unicorn now a listed public company be part of our success story We invest in your personal and professional growth with a dedicated education budget for online courses conferences and trainingsMore than 70 different nationalities make up for a truly international and diverse working environmentWe offer discounts on well known brands like Flaconi Bosch Apple and Sky as well as special offers on used cars for you your family and your friendsYou don t live in Berlin No matter You can work 100 from your home officeLife work balance is part of our culture you will receive 30 days of vacationWe offer you a secure job with a permanent contract Apply by uploading your CV with a note of your salary expectations Contact Alexander von Mohnsdorff 49 30 201 638 2056 AUTO1 Group is Europe s leading digital automotive platform As a dynamic tech company we are revolutionizing the automotive industry with our brands wirkaufendeinauto de AUTO1 com and Autohero Our strong team of 4 200 people is dedicated to making Europe wide car trading and transport as fast and stress free as possible for our customers Grow personally and shape the future of car trading with us At AUTO1 Group we live an open culture believe in direct communication and value diversity We welcome every applicant regardless of gender ethnic origin religion age sexual identity disability or any other non merit factor

column3: Senior Digital Marketing Manager m f d
column11: tink ist der Experte für alles rund um das Internet der Dinge Seit der Gründung 2016 in Berlin haben wir es uns mit unseren mehr als 100 Mitarbeitern zum Ziel gesetzt jedermann für ein vernetztes Zuhause zu begeistern Dabei konzentrieren wir uns nicht nur auf die Vermarktung der vernetzten Hardware sondern vor allem auf die dazugehörigen Dienstleistungen wie Beratung Installation Versicherungen und Mietmodelle tink wurde bereits 2018 als eines der am schnellst wachsenden Startups in Europa mit dem Tech5 Award ausgezeichnet und wir konnten mehr als 700 000 Kunden in fünf Ländern für unsere Plattform gewinnen Hinter tink stehen die Investoren Rocket Internet Cadence Growth Capital ProSiebenSat 1 und der schwedische Energieversorger Vattenfall Jetzt suchen wir weitere smarte und hoch motivierte Mitarbeiter für den Ausbau von tink Tasks Du hast einschlägige Erfahrung im Performance Marketing Bereich und möchtest signifikanten Einfluss auf den Erfolg neuer und laufender Kampagnen haben Du bist sehr analytisch und hast Spaß daran die Wachstumsstrategie zu beeinflussen Es macht Dir Spaß Mitarbeiter zu führen und ihre Kompetenzen zu entwickeln Als Senior Digital Marketing Manager bei tink bist Du dafür verantwortlich den Umsatz in mehreren Märkten über Akquisitionskanäle und plattformen wie Facebook Google Criteo usw effizient zu steigern Die Rolle umfasst somit das Skalieren neuer Kanäle um Dich funktionsübergreifend am Erfolg des Unternehmens zu beteiligen Deine Arbeit umfasst dabei u a folgende Aufgaben Du nutzt deine umfangreichen Kenntnissen in der Planung und Durchführung von digitalen Marketingkampagnen über alle relevanten Werbeplattformen wie z B Google Bing Facebook etc Du verbindest strategischen Weitblick mit technischem Wissen und Verständnis für Tracking Analysetools und hilfst uns so unsere Performance Ziele zu erreichenDu misst und bewertest die Leistung der Kampagnen und hilfst uns beim Aufbau von neuen Marketingkanälen initiativenDu wirkst mit an der Automatisierung unseres Marketings und etablierst Best Practices im TeamDu entwickelst zusammen mit Deinem Team neue Strategien und bewertest Kampagnen durch laufende Analysen Dabei sorgst Du dafür dass geeignete Maßnahmen zur Steigerung des Umsatzes eingesetzt werdenDu unterstützt uns bei der Teamplanung und entwickelst die Skills des Performance Teams weiterDu bist hands on und steigst in die Materie einIm Team bist Du an der Lösung komplexer Probleme beteiligtDu bist im engen Austausch mit dem Performance Team und arbeitest mit dem Produkt Analytics Creative und Partnerteam um den Ausbau von Initiativen voranzutreiben Requirements 4 Jahre Erfahrung im Management von digitalen Performancekampagnen vorzugsweise in einem wachstumsstarken E Commerce UnternehmenErfahrung im Management von Teams und Entwicklung von MitarbeiternAd Tech Kenntnisse im Bereich Data Driven Advertising Feed TrackingsystemeExpertise im Umgang mit Analyse Tools wie Metabase Datastudio Excel idealerweise kennst du dich auch mit SQL R oder Python ausUnabhängige Arbeitsweise gepaart mit einer Hands on Mentalität sowie Multitasking um verschiedene Dinge parallel erledigen zu könnenDu hast höchste Ansprüche an die Qualität Deiner Arbeit hast ein gutes Auge für Details und verlierst auch in hektischen Zeiten weder Deinen Kopf noch Deinen HumorAusgezeichnete Kommunikationsfähigkeiten Überzeugungskraft und Begeisterung für HerausforderungenFließende Deutsch und Englischkenntnisse sind eine Grundvoraussetzung weitere Sprachen sind ein Plus Benefits Ein erfahrenes Gründerteam mit langjährigem Hintergrund im Startup Industrie und BeratungsgeschäftEin hoch motiviertes engagiertes und internationales Team mit flachen HierarchienAchtsames Miteinander und gegenseitige Unterstützung im TeamEin hohes Maß an Flexibilität und unternehmerischer FreiheitHerausforderung und Unterstützung Deiner persönlichen EntwicklungUnsere Offices direkt im Herzen von Berlin Mitte am Hackeschen MarktCompany Benefits unter anderem eine tink Kreditkarte mit monatlichem Budget Urban Sports Club Zuschuss Teamevents und eine immer gut bestückte Bar Wir stellen sicher dass Du jeden Morgen gerne zur Arbeit gehst Klingt interessant Dann freuen wir uns auf Deine Bewerbung für unser wachsendes Team in Berlin

column3: Digital Marketing Manager DE m f d
column11: We at DCMN work closely with each other in cross functional teams and support the growth of our clients from different industries from mobility and fashion to sustainability and entertainment As we grow very fast we are looking for highly motivated people who are ready to rock with us If you are looking for a starting point to grow into a digital marketing expert please keep reading We are excited to hear from you You will be working in English and German fluency required Tasks How you will make an impact You design and implement performance oriented online marketing campaigns through various channels SEA classic display RTB retargeting video social and mobile for DCMN and for all our markets The Netherlands United Kingdom United States South Africa India and of course Germany You ll become part of our in house Leads Team and help DCMN become the preferred growth marketing partner among stakeholders around the globe You collaborate with different inhouse teams and manage various internal external stakeholders along the campaign management process You continuously analyse campaign results optimise ongoing campaigns based on your findings and create reports that reflect campaign success as well as improvement points You make decisions based on data and strive to become better and better at what you do You stay up to date with new opportunities and become the go to Online Marketing expert for the team Requirements Skills you will need to be successful Working experience in Digital Marketing either for an agency or in house We d love it if you are already familiar with marketing digital brands and or start ups You know all relevant Online Marketing Channels and how they can interact to drive a digital brand s growth You know your way around the typical online marketing tools e g Facebook Ads Manager Google Ads DSPs and Adservers You have very strong analytical skills and are not afraid of working with Excel You have a performance driven mindset with an ability to work and communicate in a fast paced international environment You know which KPIs are relevant for your campaigns When facing challenges you are able to resolve them independently or seek help from your team if you re not able to find a solution yourself Benefits Sounds like you To start your application simply click on the Apply button Sounds like you To start your application simply click on the Apply button DCMN is an equal opportunity employer and committed to hiring talented and qualified individuals with diverse backgrounds We believe that the celebration of diversity unique backgrounds qualities and cultures enrich the learning and productivity within our business and encourage that this is always the case

objectives and KPIs optimizing campaigns to maximize ROI Work closely with the other teams and stakeholders to ensure acquisition goals are met Requirements A Passion for Marketing You stay up to date on the industry platforms and changes as they roll out Related digital or Social Media Advertising experience Strong analytical ability Outstanding ability to think creatively identify and resolve problems Attention to detail and the ability to effectively multi task in a deadline driven atmosphere High levels of integrity autonomy and self motivation An energetic and willing attitude The ability to synthesize complex ideas into actionable recommendations for senior executives A hungry infectious personality we re looking for someone determined and able to win PLEASE NOTE THAT THE INTERNSHIP HAS NO REMUNERATION unpaid What We Offer You Entrepreneurial Spirit Work closely with the founders and dive into the startup scene Responsibility Bring in your own ideas and get supported in executing them Fun Experience a family culture celebrate with the founders team Flexibility Create your personal working schedule We trust you Team Be a part of a high performance cultural diverse column3: Junior Marketing Manager
column11: Job Description Unser Partner Für den Standort Berlin suchen wir ab sofort eine n Junior Online Marketing Manager in Vollzeit Diese Aufgaben warten auf dich Along with our Online Marketing Managers you plan develop and optimize wide ranging Paid Search Campaigns PPC for our retail clientsYou carefully analyze campaign performances and evaluate and interpret performance related KPIsYou prepare accurate reports and present the results in convincing presentationsYou continuously optimize and assure the quality control of campaigns with regards to defined client goalsYou make ads even more efficient by researching keywords and market trendsAfter having learned the PPC basics you specialize in technical topics and share your knowledge with the whole department Diese Benefits werden dir geboten Appraisal Interviews In your regular appraisal interviews you ll learn more about your strengths explore areas of growth and discuss your career development Be up to date Discover the latest trends by attending one of our meet ups with industry experts from other leading market players or learn from our shared conference experiences Company Socials We re all about combining work and fun Every year we get the whole company together for a company festival to discuss strategy over barbecue and beer Development plan At Crealytics you ll never stop learning which is why we offer an elaborate professional development plan Follow our set career programs or adapt them to your individual career goals Dogs allowed Don t leave poor Fido at home Our office is dog friendly Feedback culture You have an idea for how we can improve Share it in our annual employee surveys or in your end of year one on ones Fitness A healthy mind starts with a healthy body We offer our employees a selection of partnerships with fitness studios and sports memberships Flexible working hours Not a morning person Want to be home when your kids get off school We understand Flexible working hours allow you to pursue a work life balance that suits your needs Food and drinks Craving vitamins or caffeine Just stop by our kitchen and grab some fresh fruit a nice cup of cappuccino or enjoy a relaxing beer after work Game rooms Need a quick break Head over to the game room and challenge one of your fellow Crealytees to a set of table tennis a game of foosball or try your luck on our video game console Headhunting bonus Inspire your friends family neighbors or the people you meet in a park and get up to 3000 if we hire a new Crealytee referred by you International environment Not from around here Neither are most of us We ve got employees from over 40 countries helping us run international campaigns all over the world International opportunities Internationalize your career If you find a Crealytics job in another country we ll help you move there Language courses Want to brush up on your language skills Give one of our free language classes a try Lunch roulette This is a fantastic opportunity to get in touch with all your colleagues Everyone interested will be randomly sorted into small groups to go out for lunch together Onboarding mentorship From day one you ll be assigned your very own mentor They will act as your guide answering all your questions as you settle into life at Crealytics Orientation week Get off to a great start The Crealytics orientation week is an excellent opportunity to learn more about Crealytics explore our products and meet the management team Pension scheme In addition to the statutory pension scheme we offer you a non binding retirement plan for your specific situation subsidized by Crealytics of course Relocation Paid accommodation as well as experienced relocation buddies guide you through your visa application Teambuilding Bond with your team mates with an activity you ll all enjoy Each team gets a yearly incentive budget to do whatever they want Training We offer more than 60 wide ranging internal and external trainings and workshops Improve existing skills or learn something entirely new Transparency You deserve to know how we re doing as a company Join our quarterly meetings and strategy sessions to find out about current business figures product updates and the company roadmap Requirements Ideally you ve gained first hand experience in Online Marketing where you cultivated a strong interest in Search Engine Advertising SEA PPC You ve successfully completed your studies in marketing business administration or a related fieldYou love to crunch numbers and provide solid Microsoft Excel skillsYou speak German and English fluently any additional languages are a big plusDetail oriented you re a self starter who craves responsibility

column3: Brand Designer x f m BM21_108 Berlin Germany
column11: Brand Designer x f m Your role Your missions Over the past 2 years our creative Design team has been growing and now includes more than 25 multicultural and multidisciplinary designers As we continue to expand our Berlin office we are looking for our first Brand Designer to join the team As the team expands and takes form here is a rundown of some of your responsibilities Produce online and offline visuals for different teams at our company including POS visuals Booth Banners Illustrations Graphic Layouts Motion Design Icons Goodies Be the Brand Ambassador and protector across all media Participate in our company visual identity s evolution Be proactive by challenging the graphic production s processes for all our employees Your team It s hard to find a more diverse skill set than the one you ll find in the Design team User Research Product Design UX Writing and Brand Design of course Yet all the team members have something in common they care about providing the best visual assets in order to create the best experience for our users They are the guardians of the brand identity and they assist all the teams within our company to take care of this identity Their goal be sure to provide the same level of quality through the brand design on every touchpoint for our users product social media communication tools events employer branding etc Consistency is their golden rule With designers across our Paris Berlin offices for now you ll be able to learn grow your design skills in a multicultural environment Your skills You could be our next team mate if you You are a fluent speaker in English and German If you also speak French or Italian it would be a plus 3 years of experience as a graphic designer digital and print You are creative with good graphic design culture You are up to date with the current design trends and regularly benchmark other brands You have a strong graphic design portfolio The Adobe suite has no secret for you You are humble and know how to convince without being too bold You are rigorous and everything you produce is pixel perfect and ready to use Now It Would Be Fantastic If You Could Also Illustration skills Motion Design skills HTML CSS Wordpress notions About Moyyn Moyyn is AI based reverse job platform Once you apply to the platform you will be matched with several job offers from our clients and also get recommendations for various job offers If the clients find your profile interesting they will get in touch with you directly for interviews Apply once to the talent pool and get interviews from many companies directly We are recruiting candidates for this particular job as a recruiter for one of our partner platforms

column3: Senior Performance Marketing Manager SEM Display m d f
column11: This successful applicant will have responsibility for ensuring our paid marketing is delivering the predicted return As a Senior Performance Marketing Manager SEM Display you will play a critical role in our success as our ultimate objective is to deliver a complete and pleasant experience for our customers and enable our revenue growth As a Senior Performance Marketing Manager in Omio specialising in SEM Search Engine Marketing and Display you will work on This role will help define vision strategy and detailed roadmap for our automated systems for customer acquisition Build and manage the infrastructure for maximum LTV optimizationDesign implement and manage campaigns of one of the largest channels of the company across different markets and countries Be responsible for several markets and search platforms e g Google Bing Yandex Baidu Apple search ads etc Collaborate with our Marketing Engineering and BI teams to develop and maintain optimisation tools and reports Manage and analyse large set of data and keywords to make informed recommendations to our Marketing and Product teams Work closely with the design team on creation of engaging campaigns and running professional A B tests Work closely with the analytics team to fully understand the full customer journey funnel as well as all relevant performance KPIs Ensure that you keep ahead of industry best practices through research and testing What you should bring to the role Ideally you will have 5 years of experience in Performance Marketing with a focus on SEM and Display Strong experience in building data products in collaboration with the engineering and data science team Advancing web and app tracking infrastructure for paid campaigns You should have strong knowledge of Google Ads as well as good knowledge of Google Analytics and solid Excel skills Also you are familiar with at least one of the following platforms and tools Facebook Power Editor Smartly or other PMDsProgrammatic platformsAdjust or other app tracking technologies You are familiar with the major KPIs of the channel and metrics that influence KPI s performance Extensive experience in campaign management and AutomationYou have a strong analytical mindset and experience in processing a great amount of datasets and presenting insights Knowledge of any programming language such as python or SQL is considered to be a strong plus You are fluent in English additional languages such as French and German would be a beneficial What s in it for you LifeAtOmioHave an impact With innovation and smart technology we column3: Online Marketing Manager Reactivations m f x
column11: The role For our global team in Berlin we are looking for an experienced Online Marketing Manager who can help to scale up and manage reactivation campaigns across all major paid push channels As an Online Marketing Reactivation Manager you will be a part of a cross functional reactivations team you will be working together with product data design CRM tech teams as well as other online marketing team members on a coherent reactivation strategy At HelloFresh our mission is to change the way people eat forever From our 2011 founding in Europe s vibrant tech hub Berlin we ve become the global market leader in the meal kit sector and inspire millions of energised home cooks across the globe every week We offer our meal kit boxes full of exciting recipes and thoughtfully sourced fresh ingredients in more than 15 countries operating from offices in Berlin New York City Sydney Toronto London Amsterdam and Copenhagen and shipped out more than 250 Million meals in 2019 We want you to join us and help take HelloFresh to the next level as a company in its growth phase this is a great time to join Career and development opportunities are endless Above all we are looking for people who will make HelloFresh better We believe there are many different ways of developing skills and we love diverse experiences So even if you don t tick all the boxes but think you d thrive in this role we would really like to learn more about you What You ll Do Strategy and planning of all reactivation campaigns on Facebook GDN DV360 as well as other paid social and display platforms Operational set up and management of reactivations campaigns permanent optimization of campaigns towards defined KPIs Collaboration with our automation CRM and design teams with a goal to have an optimal technical and messaging set up for the campaigns What You ll Bring 3 years experience in online marketing hands on experience in management of Facebook and GDN campaigns Strong analytical communication and project management skills Problem solving mindset Ability to work independently as well as in a team Highly self motivated individual with a hands on mentality Bachelor s or Master s degree in Business Marketing or other related fields What We Offer Comprehensive relocation assistance to move to Berlin plus visa application supportHealthy discount on weekly HelloFresh boxesAnnual learning and development budget to attend conferences or purchase educational resources plus access to the HelloFresh AcademyA diverse and vibrant international environment of 70 different nationalitiesAdditional perks include Free crash course in German compensation for advanced external German classes discounts for our neighbouring gym Urban Sports Club summer winter parties discount on our HelloFresh GO vending machinesThe chance to have a significant impact on one of the fastest growing technology companies in Europe in an exciting growth phase About HelloFresh HelloFresh is on a mission to change the way people eat forever Since our 2011 founding in Europe s vibrant tech hub Berlin we ve become the world s leading meal kit provider delivering to over 4 2 million households worldwide in 15 countries across 3 continents Our more than 15 000 employees from over 70 nationalities are the heart and soul of our diverse fast paced and dynamic environment where innovation and smart fast action is encouraged We will encourage you to make an immediate impact in your area of work as well as empower you to grow your career with us Are you up for the challenge Please submit your complete application below including your salary expectations and earliest starting date After submitting an application our team will review this and get back to you within 5 business days We are HelloFresh At HelloFresh we embrace and welcome diversity and we currently employ over 15 000 individuals globally who contribute to this We employ individuals based on their ability to perform a job rather than on the basis of their race national origin colour caste social origin or position gender gender expression sexual orientation religion age disability political opinion marital status or any other characteristic We encourage everyone to apply and will give everyone equal consideration We are an equal opportunity employer everyone is welcome at our table

column3: Marketing Technology Specialist
column11: Kry is on a mission to deliver great healthcare for everyone through digital tools and physical care Backed by some of Europe s most renowned investors including Accel and Index Ventures we are building the tools that gives patients and clinicians the best possible care experience regardless of location It s anywhere anytime healthcare We are looking for a Marketing Technology Specialist to collaborate across the organization and be responsible for implementing and utilizing the best software and tools to communicate and automate Kry Livi s marketing strategy In this role you will get to work with a truly innovative and technology driven company and become part of a newly established and high performing marketing technology team You will play a key role in developing and establishing the marketing technology stack and best practices within the business You will get to combine your programming skills analytical thinking data analysis skills and marketing expertise to drive change and growth through automation and scaling of marketing activities What You ll Do Write scripts that use APIs from our marketing platforms to automate campaigns build tools to scale activity more efficiently and automate campaign testing experimentation Analyse and report on impact efficiency and opportunities for optimisation within our digital marketing portfolio using the wealth of 1st 2nd and 3rd party data we have available Set a strategy and roadmap implement and operate marketing technology products as an administrator Integrate marketing technology products with each other Integrate marketing technology products with non marketing systems including to our website app Partner up with marketing and technical stakeholders to define requirements on both ends and deliver the solutionsWork with marketing analytics teams to ensure seamless integration between platforms and measurement tracking frameworks and train them in the adoption of marketing technologies to utilize full capabilities of the tools Partner up with data science and marketing teams to conceive design execute report and take action on tests and experiments to further our understanding of how and why our channels drive customer behaviour Work closely with the Head of Marketing Technology to research evaluate and improve integrations and set up the right marketing technology stack to enable the marketing team to run the best in class marketing Who You Are Minimum of 3 years experience in MarTech with a background in combining marketing technologies with enterprise applicationsExcellent technical skills working with JavaScript Python HTML or CSS Digital marketing domain expertise programmatic display search engine marketing content marketing and CRM Strong experience in working with Adjust Adobe Analytics Google Analytics Looker GTM Salesforce Hubspot Braze Segment or other tracking marketing automation or MarTech productsGreat communication skills Commercially minded with strong analytical abilities Self starter and problem solverHands on organised and detail oriented while not losing sight of the big pictureEnjoy working in very fast paced environments At Kry we celebrate differences and are committed to creating an inclusive environment where all employees can truly belong and thrive Our mission is to provide great healthcare for everyone and in order to achieve this we believe a diverse workforce is an absolute necessity We offer a unique opportunity to gain a broad and deep understanding of the inner working at Europe s leading digital healthcare provider We value grit and a can do attitude there is a long and challenging journey ahead of us You are brave enough to set high goals and then work passionately to achieve them Last but not least we think you believe in that by working together we will achieve greater things than by working alone At Kry we care about each other and the world around us Expect to have fun and learn new things every day Please submit your application by including your CV LinkedIn GitHub or Portfolio If you have any questions regarding jobs or our recruitment process please read our FAQ or contact us on jobs kry se Please note that we do not accept any email applications due to GDPR

column3: Digital Marketing Expert f m d
column11: The Lovehoney Group is one of the world s leading companies in the sex toy market We re proud to promote sexual happiness and empowerment through design innovation research development and great customer service After an exciting 2021 merger bringing together Lovehoney Amorana and WOW Tech we re stronger than ever in our mission to destigmatize sexuality and help more people to enjoy a fulfilling love life Our award winning globally recognized brands include Fifty Shades of Grey Happy Rabbit Womanizer and We Vibe With over 700 employees spread over our offices in Bath and Berlin and all over the world the Lovehoney Group is a market leader in the pleasure industry We are currently recruiting for an exciting new role of Digital Marketing Expert to join our Consumer Digital Marketing Department The successful candidate should have a love for identifying growth opportunities across the marketing spectrum primarily led by Google Search and SERP performance insights The successful candidate should have the capacity to lead teams and set programmes up so they can be smoothly integrated into daily business This is a global role so exceptional English is a requirement and suits those with deep experience in SEM combined with broader exposure to various marketing strategies Why WOW tech You will work for some of the world s leading global pleasure brands We Vibe Womanizer Arcwave as part of the newly formed Lovehoney Group You will become part of a highly skilled team of international specialists and interesting people You will be offered a range of personal development opportunities including language courses and career specific training workshops and conference attendance You will profit from a creative knowledge sharing and stimulating environment You will enjoy our light spacious office in the heart of Berlin with all the latest mod cons and refreshments on hand to make working with us comfortable and fun Your responsibilities See yourself as a full funnel marketing architect who can liaise with experts across multiple channels to devise strategies that drive demonstrable growth Be passionate about the project of gaining a competitive edge and claiming market share for the purpose of enhancing positive experiences of sexual wellbeing Be proficient in basing strategies on data led marketing insights primarily in the field of SEM SEO and online reputation management Be able to set up processes that allow growth strategies to be absorbed into daily business and positively align stakeholders to the wider goal Be confident in leading new digital marketing projects for incubation phases to get them up and running before moving onto wider new growth focused projects Your qualifications Minimum 6 years experience in a range of digital marketing channels with demonstrable results based experience in the field of SEM Have a competence in various marketing tools and broad interesting in the wider marketing mix to identify key growth opportunitiesA welcoming friendly and engaging approach to personal communications Excellent written and verbal communication skills to build positive internal and external relationships If we ve got you interested and you re open to taking the next step in your career please apply directly with the link provideded Our privacy policy you find here https wowtech com privacy policy

column3: Senior Marketing Campaign Manager qCommerce f m d
column11: Want to be a Hero Join one of the leading global online food ordering and delivery marketplaces We are looking for a Senior Marketing Campaign Manager qCommerce f m d to join the team on our journey to always delivering amazing experiences As part of the central Quick Commerce team at Delivery Hero you ll work closely with global colleagues to support marketing campaigns driving category growth and customer retention Your Mission Define and drive global campaign solutions to enable regional Campaign Managers with a customer focused approach rooted in data and insightsInfluence product development for global tools to support our teamsEstablish an annual campaign and trade planning process with standardised approach to measurement evaluation and KPIsCollaborate with Marketing to ensure plans align and trade driving campaigns are amplified across owned and paid channels Monitor performance on a regular basis reviewing end to end customer journey analysing and reporting against business KPIs Enable local teams to make proactive optimisation decisions and deliver insights or recommendations to drive revenue Collaborate to continually improve messaging creative and user experience Guide approach to get the most from test and learn plans Spot curate and share best practices or efficiencies for global scale Your Heroic Skills You have 3 5 years experience ideally in a leading e commerce retailer or grocery retailer with at 1 2 years line management experienceYou have a strong customer centric mindset are passionate about retail and have a proven track record of delivering end to end marketing campaigns that drive commercial growthExtensive experience in Google Analytics confident mining data to evaluate performance over a range of KPIs and reporting back to stakeholders Hands on entrepreneurial mentality you take ownership and are self startingYou have a proven ability to manage multiple projects simultaneouslyYou have a high level of competence and credibility to influence strategic decisions at all levels of the organization and across different culturesYou have experience working in dynamic matrix organisationsYou are confident working closely with data and product teams Excellent organizational skills and attention to detailStrong oral written and presentation skills and ability to simplify the complex Verbal written fluency in English additional languages is a plus Why Delivery Hero English is our working language and our colleagues at Delivery Hero come from every corner of the globe working in a diverse cross cultural team For most opportunities we also offer visa relocation supportWe take care of our employees and offer flexible working hours Enjoy our free weekly online yoga classes and subsidized Urban Sports Club or GymPass membershipTake care of your mental and emotional well being with our free Headspace subscription and unlimited access to the confidential Employee Assistance ProgramParticipate in health campaigns such as seasonal flu vaccinationBenefit from subsidised products e g BVG ticket meal vouchers fruit or vegetable box or our bike rental programWe support child care needs where we partner with an external service to support tasks such as Kita search and application Au Pair or childminder searchJoin the global market leader and a publicly listed DAX company with a competitive remuneration package and a lot of training career development opportunitiesDevelop your skills with your personal educational budget for conferences and external trainingsAccess our e learning platform and participate in our various inhouse trainings including German learning optionsSave responsibly with our attractive corporate pension optionsJoin company parties team cultural and sports events due to the current situation on a virtual basisOur office lounges are filled with healthy and some more indulgent snacks and refreshments to keep you energised throughout the day About Us Delivery Hero is building the next generation global on demand delivery platform We have grown rapidly from inception in 2011 to become the world s largest food ordering network and we re now innovating and creating new verticals such as groceries pharmacies flowers and other convenience articles in multiple markets Our awesome international team already operates in 40 countries worldwide and we are looking for the most talented people to join us on our mission to always deliver an amazing experience If you re an enthusiastic problem solver and hungry for a new adventure an exciting job and multicultural workplace is waiting for you in the heart of Berlin At Delivery Hero we believe diversity and representation is key to creating not only an exciting product but also an amazing customer and employee experience Fostering this starts with hiring therefore we do not discriminate on the basis of race religion color national origin gender gender expression gender identity sexual orientation age marital status or any other aspect that makes you you Have we caught your attention If you are looking for an environment where our company DNA is defined by our values and People Leadership Principles please send us your CV We re looking forward to your application JR0012579

column3: E Commerce Manager m w d
column11: Bereits seit 2005 produziert und vermarktet das Berliner Vertical Commerce Unternehmen Berlin Brands Group als Chal Tec GmbH 2005 von Peter Chaljawski gegründet erfolgreich Produkte für Konsumenten aus den Bereichen Home Living Consumer Electronics Sound Light sowie Sports und zählt zu den umsatzstärksten Digital Unternehmen Deutschlands Die größten und bekanntesten Marken sind dabei Klarstein für Haushaltsgeräte auna für Audiogeräte sowie Capital Sports für Home Fitness Die Berlin Brands Group vereint die gesamte Wertschöpfungskette von der Produktentwicklung Konzeption und Design über Produktion und Marketing bis hin zum Kundenservice Vom Hauptsitz in Berlin steuert das Vertical Commerce Unternehmen den Markenaufbau und den Multi Channel Vertrieb der mehr als 2 500 Produkte für Verbraucher in 25 Ländern weltweit An den sechs Standorten der Berlin Brands Group in Berlin Headquarters Kamp Lintfort Logistikzentrum Bratislava Istanbul Hongkong und San Francisco arbeiten derzeit mehr als 850 Mitarbeiter Um weiterhin so erfolgreich und dynamisch zu wachsen suchen wir stets motivierte Kollegen wie dich die gemeinsam mit uns die DNA der Berlin Brands Group prägen Deine Aufgaben Du übernimmst eigenverantwortlich die Umsetzung von Maßnahmen und Projekte um unsere betriebswirtschaftlichen und qualitativen Ziele gemessen an Umsatz Traffic und Marge zu erreichen Du steuerst aktiv einen oder mehrere E Commerce Marktplätze mit einem Umsatzvolumen von bis zu 2 10 Mio Jahresumsatz Du nimmst eine Key Accounter Position für einen oder mehrere E Commerce Marktplätze ein und bist im internen und externen Austausch mit Partnern und Stakeholdern Du wirkst bei der Erhebung von Statistiken mit führst Marktbeobachtungen durch und analysierst Trends mit Hilfe diverser Research Tools Du begleitest das Monitoring von Produkten mittels Kennzahlenanalysen z B Abverkauf Retouren Du stellst sicher dass die technische Integration unsere Omnichanneltools Plentymarkets für ein generelles Marktplatzsetup geeignet ist und hilfst diese weiterzuentwicklen Du bist für das Anlegen Bearbeiten und Verwalten von Produkten und Produktgruppen auf E Commerce Marktplätzen zuständig Dein Profil Du verfügst über ein abgeschlossenes Studium oder eine abgeschlossene Ausbildung im Bereich Marketing Verkauf Vertrieb Datenverarbeitung und hast großes Interesse dich im globalen E Commerce weiterzuentwickeln Du besitzt ausgeprägte analytische Fähigkeiten hast ein Gespür für Zahlen und Trends und schätzt es datenbasierte Entscheidungen zu treffen Du bist sicher im Umgang mit Excel Analysen und großen Datenmengen Du schätzt es in internationalen Teams zu arbeiten und selbstständig Herausforderungen anzunehmen und zu lösen Deine Deutsch und Englischkenntnisse sind auf C1 Level Wir bieten Aufregende und eigenverantwortliche Projekte in einem der führenden europäischen E Commerce Firmen Flexibles und Hybrid Working Model und ein modern ausgestattetes Office im Herzen Berlins Spittelmarkt Eine internationale und dynamische Arbeitsatmosphäre Erfolge feiern wir gemeinsam auf zahlreichen Events Persönliche Weiterbildungsmöglichkeiten Sprachkurse sowie Teamtrainings und Coachings Company Benefits wie ÖPNV Ticket Zuschuss 30 Rabatt auf Produkte aus unserem eigenen Shop und 40 Arbeitgeberzuschuss zur betrieblichen Altersvorsorge Täglich frisches Obst Gemüse sowie Getränke und diverse Gesundheitsangebote z B Physiotherapie Yoga und Rücken Fit Kurse Einschränkungen treten aufgrund von Corona Richtlinien auf JOIN THE GANG Werde Teil der Gang und starte bei einem der führenden E Commerce Unternehmen Europas Wie Bewirb dich ganz leicht über unser Online Bewerbungsformular Berlin Brands Group Wallstr 16 10179 Berlin www berlin brands group com

column3: Senior Marketing Manager m f x
column11: Job Description Applause empowers leading brands to deliver flawless digital experiences for their customers on any device in every location The company s testing feedback and research solutions enable businesses to delight customers drive topline revenue and innovate faster Applause ensures digital quality for websites mobile apps IoT products and in store interactions in a way no other approach can via its technology platform and managed global community of over 550 000 on demand digital experience experts Only real people on real devices in real locations can provide the real issues and feedback that brands need to deliver great digital customer experiences Thousands of companies of every size including Google FOX Nike BMW PayPal and Slack rely on Applause to dramatically decrease the time and cost of delivering great digital experiences for their customers To help us grow the European market we are looking for a Senior Marketing Manager m f x Location Berlin or remotely in Germany UK France Spain or Italy As a Senior Marketing Manager you will work closely with the Global Vice President of Marketing to build and execute marketing programs for successful inbound and outbound demand gen campaigns for Applause s European markets Here s your opportunity to work in an international team setup for one of the hottest fastest growing tech companies in Berlin Applause Your responsibilities are You will be setting up and executing best in class marketing strategies for our European market with a focus on D A CH UK France Italy Spain Benelux and the Nordics You will be responsible for the conceptual planning implementation management and optimization of marketing campaigns throughout all channels for lead generation e g webinars Google Adwords email campaigns etc You will manage online events and increase our field marketing presence together with the sales teams You will support the international content team in the creation of landing pages and content for our website such as white papers webinars as well as eBooks You will work to identify validate and continuously expand new marketing channels You will partner closely with the EU Sales team to align Sales and Marketing activities to maximize effectiveness and keep Applause positioned as the world s leading provider of crowdtesting solutions You will continuously optimize key metrics together with your team based on continuous optimization leveraging latest technology and employing new innovative marketing approaches You will directly report to the Global Vice President of Marketing and have dotted line reporting to the General Manager for our European business Manage your own projects in collaboration with other units such as Sales or Delivery Your profile should look like this You have 3 years of professional experience in B2B marketing ideally in the IT industry e g tech startups SaaS mobile industry You possess a strong understanding of global and regional marketing campaigns and have first hand experience in the planning and execution of marketing events and field marketing In the past you have already worked with Marketo or similar providers of marketing automation tools and gained experience in interacting with marketing technology and platforms You were responsible for marketing budgets and managed them You are comfortable in collaborating with sales teams and building marketing campaigns that will support the full sales cycle You have experience in engaging with customers thought leaders and industry professionals You have a good understanding of current trends in the digital world and are interested to learn more Fluency in English excellent in both verbal and written an additional language on native level French or German is a plus What we offer you A great office in the heart of Berlin right next to the Gleisdreieckpark Very good remote work setup Be part of an international team full of passionate and skilled people from 38 different nationalities Variety of learning and development opportunities Team events home office option dog friendly office team runs etc Attractive salary unlimited work contract and flexible work hours Great company culture and pleasant work atmosphere Four times 2016 2020 on Kununu s List of Berlin s best employers Among Germany s Best mid sized employers 2019 2020 Focus Business Magazine Would you like to be involved in the expansion of an international company and work for one of the fastest growing technology companies Then Applause is the perfect company for you Applause is a place where everyone belongs and where we believe everyone deserves the exceptional Since our founding we have continued to celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment We have a global workforce that like our crowd embraces diverse backgrounds perspectives and abilities Our employees bring their true self to Applause We prohibit discrimination and harassment of any kind based on race color religion national origin sex including pregnancy sexual orientation gender identity gender expression age veteran status genetic information disability or other applicable legally protected characteristics If you would like to request an accommodation due to a disability please contact us at adaaccommodations applause com

column3: Vice President of Growth Performance Marketing Remarketing CRM m f d
column11: We are looking for a Vice President of Growth m f d to head LOVOO s Growth Marketing initiatives Reporting to the CEO you will be leading the Growth area consisting of the departments Paid Customer Acquisition Remarketing CRM and Product Marketing both operationally and strategically This is a great opportunity for you as a data driven leader with a goal getter mindset to join LOVOO at a very exciting time and be one of the key contributors in driving the next phase of Growth At LOVOO we work side by side on our shared vision and especially want to strongly encourage people of color transgender people queer gay and non binary people parents and people with disabilities to apply to join us Everyone is welcome at LOVOO If you prefer please share your pronoun directly in your application with us e g he him she her they he him him etc What you can expect Key responsibility for establishing the definition and realization of strategic marketing initiatives across various marketing functions Paid Customer Acquisition Remarketing Product Marketing and CRM Leading and mentoring talented and enthusiastic team leaders of our Growth department with personnel responsibility Full ownership of the marketing budget and KPIs with the accountability to drive maximum ROI Responsibility for all data analyses and reports regarding the efficiency of our Growth measures as well as the identification and implementation of further optimization plans Leveraging lifecycle marketing via push chat in app modal and email to engage and re engage users Driving cross functional projects in collaboration with our Product Management Analytics and User Research teams in order to create and implement new experiences that foster meaningful Growth Close collaboration with our Management VPs as well as collaboration with other sister companies in ParshipMeet Group as and when required Your profile At least eight years of professional experience in the field of Growth Marketing Performance Marketing Advertising as well as three years experience in a leading position in this area Experience in scaling and developing high performance teams Comprehensive knowledge in field of Paid Acquisition Remarketing Marketing Automation and Product Marketing as well as applied knowledge in the areas with regard to the DACH market Many years of experience in B2C technology industry in a similar role as well as in defining and evolving ROI measurement models Comprehensive Growth planning experience as well as in research forecasting planning execution and performance analysis Pronounced skills in developing the company s key channels as well as the related processes and procedures High competence in handling multiple channels of Paid Marketing such as SEM Social Display Affiliate Strong excitement of growing business as well as providing leadership to do so and strategically push the company s goals forward Excellent analytical skills and a sound understanding of data analysis and data science Strong entrepreneurial thinking as well as a hands on and doer mentality High level communication skills as well as a proactive pragmatic and solution oriented composition Very good written and spoken English skills German skills are a strong plus

column3: SEO Manager Italy m f x
column11: Job Description When someone says Frog you don t think of a little green animal but instead you re inspired for your next analysis Then you ve found your position 0 We love SEO and have done so since our inception in 2000 Content is Queen King but technical and data challenges also wait for you It s not just with the SEO Team where you can philosophise about pagination but also with the CMO the CEOs and the SEO Tech Team If you re not fazed by large amounts of data and enjoy the challenge of complex tasks then you ve come to the right place About Your New Role As SEO Manager you are responsible for the conception and implementation of SEO projects that improve the idealo SEO performance with focus on our Italian domain idealo it On top of that you are also contributing to our global SEO strategy and roadmap You conduct keyword research and work on keyword cluster analysis which then allows you to set the content strategy together with the ITA content team You work closely with the ITA Management Team and the ITA Country Manager in order to create the overall strategy for idealo it Projects are not limited to the Italian market some of your initiatives extend to all idealo s 6 countries and come to life in cross functional teams Optimisations of our on page structure internal linking landing pages and search engine crawling also belong to your responsibilities You monitor and evaluate SEO performance come up with concepts tests to improve it and manage the projects from start spec to finish QA evaluation Job requirements Skills Requirements SEO is your passion and it s backed up by 2 or more years of professional experience You have already gained experience in technical SEO analysis and reporting and have an understanding of ranking factors for Google s algorithm You have SEO tool knowledge Screaming Frog Sistrix Searchmetrics ahrefs Search Console or similar tools You are adept at using Excel and have a keen eye for data Knowledge of SQL and other databases is also advantageous You are fluent in Italian and in English German is a plus not a must Understanding of HTML CSS is a plus Your benefits at idealo More than 1200 motivated colleagues from 40 nations Welcome to Berlin our new headquarter with its outstanding modern architecture and light flooded offices is located close to the former Berlin Wall in the center of what used to be the heart of Berlin s news and publishers economy Family friendliness based on deep conviction including flexible working hours remote work options and 30 vacation days per year So happy We have been named Germany s best employer in the Internet multimedia sector for the second year in a row Source Focus Business 01 2021 issue dated 19 02 2021 About Idealo idealo is a Berlin success story in 2000 we started out with the mission of helping consumers make the best purchasing decisions Right in the heart of Berlin over 1 000 employees from 40 nations are working on the future of online shopping We focussing on agile and self reliant work sustainability and a healthy relationship between work and private life These values are firmly anchored in our corporate culture and an integral part of our corporate philosophy As part of our team you can look forward to freedom an international and inspiring working environment Your ideas are particularly important to us Not only our product portfolio is diverse but also the people who work on it We want you just as you are Origin religion gender sexual orientation or a severely handicapped degree do not play a role Information for applicants with severe disabilities As an applicant with a severe disability you can get advice from our Severely Disabled Representation SBV during the application process idealo continues hiring during the COVID 19 pandemic We do still hire great talent from around the world Due to the ongoing COVID 19 pandemic we are checking almost every day with the authorities if and how we can relocate talent from EU and non EU countries to work with idealo Please bear in mind that we will take individual decisions in close consultation with the applicant and the authorities

testing and rapidly developing campaigns ads and conversion elements to increase efficiency Manage and analyze a large set of data to provide insightful channel reporting Drive automation processes that help save time on the operational level Collaborating with other channels and teams to optimize the performance of the campaigns Grow and develop your team you ll have one team member to start Google Sheets skills Experience with the creative conception planning implementation and performance measurement of Search campaigns Experience with campaign automation bid management strategies tracking and reporting Proactive and well organized you know how to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines Excellent written and spoken communication in English Good to have Good knowledge of other
