column3: Senior Technical Marketing Manager m f d
column11: Company Description We are Flink your online supermarket revolutionising the way you do your grocery shopping With a wide selection of over 2 400 high quality products we aim to deliver to your door in just 10 minutes We put our customers first and ensure all products delivered are fresh and nutritious In addition to this we are able customise our national assortment to be able to offer you unique local products in every city Our delivery hubs are located in densely populated inner city locations and we strive to be sustainable by delivering on electric bikes and using packaging that can be recycled Founded by experienced e commerce professionals and backed by some of the most renowned investors in Europe we are growing rapidly and have a great hunger to continuously challenge ourselves We pride ourselves in being an inclusive and equal opportunities employer with a diverse and multicultural team If you want to be part of this exciting journey read on In your role as Technical Marketing Manager you will own the tracking and attribution solutions of our marketing channels Furthermore you will be collaborating with passionate colleagues from the Display SEM Growth and Tech team by pushing projects around attribution and tracking Job Description Own the Adjust and Segment setup and management to guarantee the best tracking and attribution solutions utilized in our Performance Marketing channelsLead the Web tracking setup with BI and Product establishing long term stable and clean solutionsSupport channels managers on tracking and attribution challenges from our always changing market i e iOS14 changes EU cookie regulations etc Analyze data continuously to quickly identify flaws or points of improvement in the current tracking setupCollaborate with Display SEM Growth Product BI and Tech on projects around attribution and tracking Qualifications You have a minimum 2 years experience in Marketing Tech Experience managing Performance Marketing campaigns is a plusYou have experience setting up MMPs Google Tag Management conversion modelling attribution strategies and other tracking solutionsYou have strong analytical skillsYou have excellent written and spoken communication in English and GermanYou have a Bachelor s degree or equivalent work experience a degree in business marketing statistics or computer science is a plus Additional Information A cool 20 off your personal Flink orders be the first to test out new products A unique opportunity to be an early bird and have an impact on our strategyA steep learning curve the possibility to work in an energised and dynamic team within a fast paced environmentFlat company structure where taking leadership is encouragedFor Berlin A newly renovated and spacious HQ in the heart of Kreuzberg lots of delicious lunch spots available within short walking distance It is our commitment that every applicant will be evaluated according to their skills regardless of age gender identity ethnicity sexual orientation disability status or religion

column3: Director of Online Marketing m f x
column11: The role We are looking for a world class strategically minded results focused individual who sets the agenda at all levels and brings a track record of success As the Director for Online Marketing you will embody a growth mindset while having a substantial budget to work with to drive repeatable and scalable results across multiple organic paid channels in 20 countries and brands You will be the final owner of a holistic HelloFresh strategy for all brands and countries as well as all Paid Social Programmatic Display SEA and SEO Reporting to our VP Paid Marketing you will spearhead both strategy and execution to optimize a massive marketing budget against company goals Our ideal candidate will have broad visibility across the business as well as the global HelloFresh Community and will collaborate daily with peers in Growth Tech Brand Creative Finance and Analytics This is a high performance high impact role driving incredible growth at Hello Fresh working across the Growth Organisation What You ll Do Lead the customer acquisition strategy and establish best in class practices across paid and organic digital channels such as Paid Social Native Paid Search SEO and Programmatic DisplayBuild lead and develop a team of highly capable growth marketers in a performance driven cultureUse data driven methodology analysis and measurement to improve effectiveness and efficiency of our performance channelsOversee campaign management and reporting including in depth analytics of LTV CPA ROI and incrementalityManage the testing framework and feedback loop for the brand team to continuously iterate on creative assets and execute experiments and conversion tests to improve ROIHave a passion for innovation as well as tenacity for owning the end to end customer acquisition funnel collaborating across multiple functions and driving business results for both the short and long termOperate a continuous improvement service delivery model to increase portfolio and channel efficiencies for deliveryPartner with internal teams to optimize campaign performance eg Creative BI Digital Product etc targeting optimization creative direction etc Collaborate with Data Science and Tech to develop tooling automation and new measurement methodologies improve measurement rigor and optimize performance What You ll Bring 10 years of experience directly managing marketing campaigns at 15M annual budget client or agency sideObsessed with growth while not being afraid to get your hands dirty Able to build lead empower and inspire a team of direct reports to do the best work of their lives resulting in a world class high performing teamA natural hustler with a contagious can do attitude who thrives in fast paced environmentsA very strong strategic and analytical thinker who likes solving difficult problemsConfident in communicating across the organization with cross functional stakeholders and to executive leadershipStrong analytical skills able to use data to optimize day to day performance and run split testing campaigns Equipped with a profound knowledge of the latest technologies and market trends for major online platformsA team player who gets the column3: Marketing Affiliate Manager DE
column11: Job Description Summary Rakuten DE is a newly launched Point back Platform operating in the DACH region The platform allows users to shop through affiliate partners earning points on purchases made to be redeemed with sister companies in the Rakuten ecosystem together with direct exchange for shop credit at major DE retailors To further develop our business on DE we are looking for a driven Marketing Affiliate Manager DE to scale affiliate partner acquisition and execute wider marketing activities for the region Key Responsibilities Plan and manage weekly content operations for the Rakuten DE platform including coordination of seasonal advertiser and product highlights Work closely with key stakeholders for the Rakuten DE Affiliate Business including European Product and Design teams Create and develop content marketing programmes and strategies to drive the brand customer loyalty retention and cross use Ensure deployment of campaign creatives in time and quality Act as point of contact for Rakuten DE affiliate partnerships including negotiation of commission rate increases and joint campaigns Work closely with in house analysts to understand and report on campaign performance and opportunities for driving growth Act as key DE liaison with other departments and their stakeholders Identify implement and manage new innovations to facilitate growth MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS Knowledge Skills Abilities To perform this job successfully an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge skill and or ability required Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions Minimum 2 years of experience in account management online marketing project management Qualification Requirements Bachelor s degree in marketing or comparable experience Native German speaking and Business proficient English skills required

column3: Performance Marketing Manager d f m
column11: Job Description Do you like ads So do we In fact Performance Marketing is currently one of our main traffic drivers This is why we need some more talents to add to our awesome team We re looking for a Performance Marketing Manager to help us get the most out of our advertising budgets This person will report to the Head of Performance Marketing and will be part of our centralized Marketing department that supports all our brands Requirements Your challenge Take charge of the full paid advertising process Plan create analyze optimize and report adsGet the best results out of our performance channels with a focus on Facebook Instagram and SEMConceptualize run and document experiments that aim to continuously improve resultsAnalyze data to find the best setup for our automated prospecting and retargeting campaignsReport back results to the brand stakeholders and together with them come up with exciting new ad ideasWork closely with our inhouse creative team to make sure we always run the most engaging ads About you At least 2 years of hands on experience in performance marketing preferably in an e commerce environmentFacebook and or Google Ads hold no more secrets for you and you ve been responsible for 6 digit budgets beforeProven success with optimizing towards both revenue and retention KPIsGreat analytical skills excel sheets make you happy and you don t shy away from complex topics like attributionGood understanding of common performance marketing tools such as Google Analytics FB Business manager etc Bonus points for experience with one of these channels Affiliate display native advertisingPlus points if your German is at least at B1 level What Realtainment can offer you An innovative fast growing company with significant investments A 1200 sqm office space with a feel good factor A platform to bring out the creative and fun side in you by participating in our awesome events like ArtNight PlantNight BakeNight and ShakeNight Open minded and ambitious colleagues who are looking forward to taking off with you and celebrating success at exuberant team events We have an authentic feedback culture constructive and open which always focuses on promoting your personal development and growth Did we spark your interest to join a challenge in an ambitious creative and fast growing company Then apply now with your detailed application information about your salary expectations and your earliest possible starting date Ann Margret is looking forward to your application We connect people with varied events that offer a high entertainment factor and where everyone learns something new More than 80 employees and a network of over 900 workshop leaders give their best every day to build Europe s leading platform for creative experiences As a team we attach great importance to being ourselves and to doing exactly what drives us every day To further revolutionize the way people get together We build teams that challenge the applicant regardless of gender ethnic origin religion age sexual identity disability or other grounds of discrimination Personal formulations in the job advertisement are to be considered gender neutral

column3: E Commerce Manager m f d
column11: Berlin Brands Group BBG has been designing producing and selling products in the home living consumer electronics sound light and sports categories since 2005 and is now one of Europe s largest digital companies BBG creates builds buys and scales consumer brands globally Our scalable infrastructure and profitable commercial model is driving hyper growth last year reporting 2020 revenues of 334M Our products are sold across channels including direct to consumer e commerce online marketplaces including Amazon and wholesale to retailers and distributors Our passion lies in kitchen appliances garden living sports and HiFi Our largest and best known brands are Klarstein auna blumfeldt and Capital Sports These are just a few examples within our portfolio of over 23 consumer product brands that is rapidly expanding as we welcome new brands to the group We distribute over 3 700 products to consumers in 28 countries worldwide BBG is now over 1 000 employees strong working in locations spanning the globe from Europe UK USA to Asia Our global headquarters are in Berlin Germany and we are now rapidly expanding our business We are scaling up and investing in world class logistics and fulfilment innovative digital marketing e commerce marketplace development and other sales channels To fuel this growth we are looking for talented and motivated colleagues like you to join us in shaping the DNA of BBG Your responsibilities You will implement measures and projects on your own responsibility in order to achieve our business management and qualitative goals measured in terms of turnover traffic and margin You actively manage one or more e commerce marketplaces with a sales volume of up to 2 10 million annual turnover You take on a key account position for one or more e commerce marketplaces and are responsible for the internal and external exchange with partners and stakeholders You contribute to the assembly of statistics conduct market observations and analyse trends with the help of various research tools You accompany the monitoring of products by means of key figure analyses e g sales returns You ensure that the technical integration of our omnichannel tools Plentymarkets is suitable for a general marketplace setup and help to develop it further You are responsible for creating editing and managing products and product groups on e commerce marketplaces Your profile You have professional experience in e commerce and a great interest in technology in the area of consumer electronics and household appliances and ideally experience with Amazon You have a degree or completed training in the field of marketing sales data processing and are very interested in developing yourself further in global e commerce You have strong analytical skills a flair for numbers and trends and appreciate making data based decisions You are comfortable with Excel analytics and big data You appreciate working in international teams and taking on and solving challenges independently Your German and English skills are on C1 level We offer Challenging projects with plenty of entrepreneurial freedom in one of Europe s leading e commerce companies Flexible and hybrid working model with a modern office in the heart of Berlin Spittelmarkt An international and dynamic working environment We celebrate success together at numerous company events currently digital Opportunities for professional development language courses as well as team training and coaching Company benefits such as public transport ticket grant 30 discount on products from our own shop and 40 employer s contribution to the company pension plan Daily fresh fruits and vegetables as well as drinks and various health offers e g physiotherapy yoga and back training courses restrictions occur due to corona guidelines JOIN THE GANG Become a member of one of Europe s leading ecommerce companies and fill out the online application below We are looking forward to your application Berlin Brands Group Wallstr 16 10179 Berlin www berlin brands group com

column3: BI Data Scientist
column11: JustWatch offers data driven movie marketing for the film industry Based on user data from justwatch com and our apps now the largest streaming search engine worldwide we run data driven digital marketing campaigns for Hollywood s latest blockbusters most popular shows as well as independent movies Who we are looking for We are looking for someone with extensive knowledge in the field of predictive analytics who will help us to build a model to forecast the success of movies tv shows We love challenging goals We question everything We are always learning and we are excellent in execution We believe in the 80 20 rule and try to apply common sense and pragmatism to everything Here s What You Will Do Develop and iterate a model that uses extensive survey data to predict how many streamers will actually watch the movie or show in the endHelp develop an extensive benchmarking system for our surveys that spans multiple platforms and employ statistical methods to gain insights from survey resultsMake sure we gather the right data points needed to achieve this and assist our survey team improve their processSetup and implement the tooling environmentManage stakeholders and communicate findings with plain english and intuitive charts What You Will Need Passion for movies and tv shows and eagerness to build a predictive model to forecast the performance of movies tv shows on streaming servicesSolid knowledge of statistics e g population vs sample credible interval vs confidence interval bootstrapping hypothesis testingHands on experience with data modelling prediction techniques and tools Techniques unsupervised and supervised Machine Learning including clustering methods predictive models outlier detection sentiment analysis and recommender systemsLanguages PythonML and Visualisation sklearn XGboost pandas AUTOML Plotly Altair SeabornModel Explainability SHAP Explainerdashboard EVALMInterest in gathering insights from historical data and passion for predicting the future from this data in generalAbility to apply data cleaning feature engineering statistics machine learning and common sense to predict future behaviorAbility to cope with imperfect data setsFluent English If you feel like you are missing some of the hard skills don t worry we are hiring for the attitude values and personality Currently we all work from home which is why the role initially will be remote Yet we miss the human contact and real life team spirit and are excited to get back to our new offices at the historic Backfabrik as soon as possible So in a couple of months the role will be Berlin Based If you do not live in Berlin we provide relocation and visa support We embrace our entrepreneurial responsibilities Through our 6 figure environmental and social impact budget we offset every employee s carbon footprint give back to the community support causes that matter and have recently implemented a wellbeing and mental health programme Read more about our culture in our blog post and Talent page https www justwatch com de Talent How to apply Show your interest in any way that works for you we simplified the application process send us whatever you have or just your Linkedin and a brief message explaining why you are a great fit for this role

them Our Austrian branch and its 150 employees enjoy the dynamics as well as the development potential of a startup but is backed up and supported by the corporate group Our platform and team runs fully independent We are measured by results But the decision on how to achieve them is fully on us We are looking for motivated and enthusiastic team members to accompany us on our mission The ideal candidate who convinces above all through an innovative way of thinking and a strongly developed hands on mentality will find an exciting position in our team This is your chance to help shape our future The position is based in Vienna Austria The position is full time 40 hours week and we offer an unlimited contract Your Mission Working closely with mjam s CMO you will be responsible for driving strategy and planning setting priorities and KPIs as well as promoting continuous development of all performance marketing and CRM activities to achieve ambitious growth targets across all verticals In close collaboration with our Central performance marketing teams you will own the strategy and oversee the execution of our existing performance marketing channels in search and display Google Ads Bing Ads Facebook Instagram Retargeting YouTube etc as well as our CRM activitiesBased on a clean tracking and performance monitoring you allocate budgets smartly across the different channels Thereby you act routinely in the area of tension low CPA CPO vs scaling You will provide thought leadership strategic insight and clear communication to the team on an effective growth strategy You work closely with our campaigns and offline team to give strategic guidance in terms of media buying Furthermore you observe trends in the market and try to continuously open new channels for Whitebox through stringent testing The continuous success control and reporting with the help of dashboards presentations and ad hoc analyses also falls within your area of responsibility Your Heroic Skills At least 5 years experience working in Performance Marketing and with CRM Tools An expert collaborator you can work in international and cross functional teams and deliver results You have gained experience in presenting complex data and analyses to senior management You re analytical as well as data driven but also have an eye for great content which enables you to plan create collaboration with the marketing team Data Science Design Content Online Marketing Excellent communication skills in German and English are required What We Offer You Unique entrepreneurial opportunity to help build the future of delivery Dynamic fast moving environment with a friendly atmosphere and determined employees Our team in which enjoyment of work enthusiasm team spirit and appreciative cooperation are not empty promises but are lived every day Extensive home office policy you can work where you can work best be it the office or from home Great learning curve in a collaborative environment with no boundaries for ideas as well as 1 000 00 educational budget every year Lots and lots of other benefits ranging from food vouchers to team events and pension schemes Attractive salary in line with the market starting at 60 000 00 p a based on your qualifications and professional experience with the option of overpayment At Delivery Hero we believe that diversity is the key to creating not only an exciting product but also a superior customer and employee experience Encouraging this starts with recruitment so we do not discriminate on the basis of religion colour ethnicity gender sexual orientation age marital status or any other aspect that makes you who you are Have we caught your attention Then please send us your application including CV salary expectations and earliest starting date We re looking forward to your application JR0015673

column3: Senior Digital Marketing Manager
column11: We at DCMN work closely with each other in cross functional teams and support the growth of clients from a broad scope of industries from Mobility and Fashion to Sustainability and Smart Home If you m f d x are looking for a new opportunity to unleash your potential to help businesses reach the unthinkable with digital marketing campaigns please keep reading We are excited to hear from you How you will make an impact You design and implement performance oriented online marketing campaigns through various channels SEA classic display RTB retargeting online video OTT paid social and influencers for DCMN and for all our markets The Netherlands United Kingdom United States and of course Germany You ll become part of our in house Leads Team and help DCMN become the preferred growth marketing partner among stakeholders around the globe You collaborate with your team throughout different disciplines data science content creation design events and website development and align your work with other lead generating activities You continuously analyse campaign results optimise ongoing campaigns based on your findings and create reports that reflect campaign success as well as improvement points You make decisions based on data and strive to become better and better at what you do You stay up to date with new opportunities and become the go to Online Marketing expert for the team Language requirements You master the art of efficient communication in EnglishA second language e g German or Dutch is a plus Skills you will need to be successful Minimum of 5 years working experience in Digital Marketing either for an agency or in house We d love if you are already familiar with marketing digital brands and or start ups You know all relevant Online Marketing Channels and how they can interact to drive a digital brand s growth You know your way around the typical online marketing tools e g Facebook Ads Manager Google Ads DSPs and Adservers You have very strong analytical skills and are not afraid of working with Excel Tableau or Google Data Studio is a big plus You have a performance driven mindset with an ability to work and communicate in a fast paced international environment You know which KPIs are relevant for your campaigns When facing challenges you are able to resolve them independently or seek help from your team if you re not able to find a solution yourself You can find out more about our company culture and our employee benefits on our career site https careers dcmn com

column3: Senior Performance Marketing Manager in w m d
column11: What makes working at voiio unique You will get the opportunity to be responsible for our performance marketing and to build up your own departmentYou will experience a very family friendly and value oriented corporate culture at voiio We focus on sustainability transparency and communication We are also the best and craziest team in the worldYou choose how you want to work Switch between full and part time benefit from 30 vacation days and enjoy home office and flexible working hours You work in a start up with meaning and impact In addition you can expect many opportunities for further training as well as fast promotion opportunities due to our continuous growth You ll get unlimited access to our platform that supports you in every phase of life around family wellbeing and mindfulness You will work in a beautiful open office in the heart of Berlin with fair compensation paid overtime fresh fruit cold drinks and regular events What makes your position unique As Senior Performance Marketing Manager in you will get the change to build up and scale our customer acquisition strategies and tactics in order to shape our Performance Marketing Being in charge for all of our Performance Marketing Channels and respective reportings as well as our customer acquisition channels SEM paid social retargeting landing pages etc you will have a real impact on our success You develop creative growth strategies plan test and accelerate new performance channels to drive voiios future growth You drive optimization approaches for our keyword sets ad designs and bidding strategies based on experiments and quick learningsYou master channel KPIs reportings and the tracking of our marketing activitiesYou always have an eye on the impact of our marketing campaigns and create analysis and reports for regular success monitoring and continuous learningYou manage our SEO freelancerYou help create CRO landing pages and optimize our website as magnet and conversion driverFinally you regularly exchange information with other teams data analysis product development content graphics etc and develop measures to ensure the quality of the paid traffic in the long term What makes you unique You have 3 or more years of operational experience in performance marketing across various B2B channels SEM Paid Social Display and Affiliate preferential You have advanced knowledge of online advertising platforms and analytics tools for online channels AdWords LinkedIn Xing Facebook Instagram YouTube Google Analytics etc You have a deep understanding of attribution models A B testing and tracking systemsYou have build performance marketing reports defined KPI s and metrics in order to measure success and impact of your workYou are experienced with CRO UX Landing Pages A B Testing website building structure technical SEO CRO etc is a strong plusYou have experience with the B2B customer journey understand SaaS Businesses and respective funnel KPI sYou have a growth marketing mindset and have already worked with growth hacking frameworks and instrumentsYou have strong analytical skills a hands on mentality as well as a data driven and structured way of workingYou are fluent in English German is a plusYou are a teamplayer and enjoy your job Contact details You are ready to change the work environments of tomorrow together with us qualifications in your application Your cultural and social background gender skin color age religion ideology or sexual orientation do not matter in the application process

column3: Product Manager m f d Electron Microscope Analyzers
column11: Überblick As one of the world s leading analytical instrumentation companies Bruker covers a broad spectrum of advanced solutions in all fields of et and support industries in successfully enhancing quality of life We ve been driving innovation in analytical instrumentation for 60 years now Today worldwide more than 7 200 employees are working on this permanent challenge at over 70 locations on all continents The Bruker Nano Analytics BNA Division headquartered at Bruker Nano GmbH in Berlin Germany develops manufactures and markets state of the art systems and components for elemental and structural analysis on micro and nano scale We are currently seeking a Product Manager m f d for our electron microscopy analyzer EMA product line The EMA product line includes the Esprit SW platform and 4 analytical instruments EDS WDS EBSD and a micro spot X ray sources for Micro XRF on SEM The successful candidate will be responsible for the definition of a market leading product strategy for the Esprit software platform and for developing and implementing a product positioning strategy for Quantax EDS products They will be responsible for managing all aspect of product life cycle of the product from market research product development to obsolescence Aufgaben Verantwortlichkeiten Development of overall product vision and product roadmap for EMA products with focus on analytical software platform Esprit and EDS products Definition and implementation of market relevant product specifications and delivery of MRDs with prioritized features and corresponding financial justifications Management of PLC process during all phases of product life cycle Identification of new applications with high growth potential and development of solutions in collaboration with key customers and sales Gather evaluate and summarize competitor information and market trendsEnsure continuous awareness of competitive developments in the field including attendance and presentations at customer facing events and internal trainings Establish and foster relationships with internal stakeholders in R D sales and operations with the goal to align and optimize the internal activities Plan and coordinate product presentations on trade shows user conferences etc in cooperation with marketing regional sales managers and distributors Responsibility for the technical content of product related documents and publications manuals brochures website advertisements articles presentations Determination of product pricing generation and maintenance of price lists and standard quotations for product line Qualifikationen Bachelor s Degree and minimum of 2 years work related experience required Degree in engineering natural sciences or business management preferred Ideally experience in product management of electron microscope analyzers and or analytical software platform products Interdisciplinary technical and economic competencies Proficient organizational skills and ability to manage competing priorities in a fast pace environment Outgoing personality as well as a proven track record in establishing positive productive relationships with internal and external stakeholders Strong work ethic sense of commitment and a desire to succeed Advanced verbal communication initiative and solid judgment abilities skills Self reliant and systematic work style Excellent command of English both written and verbal German skills are considered a plus Willingness and ability to travel extensively domestic and overseas approx 30 of the time usually short trips Are you interested Please send us your online application including details of your salary expectations and availability Please note that all applications must be completed using the online form we do not accept applications via e mail

column3: Projektmanager im E Commerce m w x
column11: Job Description Dein Ziel ist es unsere Kund innen von ihrem Einkaufserlebnis bei idealo zu begeistern die Kund innenaktivität maßgeblich zu steigern und unsere Kund innen zu begeisterten Stammkund innen zu machen Dabei hast Du immer einen strategischen Blick auf das Thema Customer Experience prüfst aktuelle Trends und Entwicklungen leitest entsprechende Potentiale für idealo ab und setzt diese in enger Zusammenarbeit mit bereichsübergreifenden Teams und Stakeholdern um Die Stelle als Projektmanager Customer Experience Development m w x ist in Voll und Teilzeit ausgeschrieben Deine Aufgaben Als Projektmanager Customer Experience Development verantwortest Du abteilungs und bereichsübergreifende Projekte von der Discovery bis zur Implementierung und zum Produkt Rollout In enger Zusammenarbeit mit den Abteilungen Customer Experience Analytics und UX Research identifizierst Du Wachstumspotentiale für idealo und setzt diese in Projekten um Du hast immer ein offenes Ohr für Deine Stakeholder innen und löst bestehende Probleme zielgerichtet und effektiv Du erstellst Ergebnispräsentationen Entscheidungsvorlagen und hältst fehlende Projektfortschritte stets transparent Du moderierst Workshops Retros Reviews und führst souverän durch Stakeholder Meetings Als Teil von Customer Experience Development baust Du Abteilungsstrukturen mit auf und unterstützt den Business Bereich Customer Experience CX Development CX Analytics Payments Customer Care und Merchant Performance Quality insgesamt in seiner Weiterentwicklung Job requirements Das bringst Du mit Du hast ein erfolgreich abgeschlossenes Studium mit wirtschaftlichem Hintergrund oder einer anderen relevanten Fachrichtung Du kennst den E Commerce Markt und verstehst was Händler innen brauchen um erfolgreich zu sein und was Kund innen brauchen um ein positives Einkaufserlebnis zu haben Du hast Erfahrung in der Leitung von cross funktionalen Teams und schaffst es auch bereichsübergreifende Projekte erfolgreich zu realisieren Du argumentierst klar und empathisch und verstehst es Andere zu motivieren Starke analytische Fähigkeiten und Problemlösungskompetenz kombinierst Du mit einer Get it done Einstellung Du bist erfahren im Umgang mit Excel und PowerPoint Tableau Confluence und Jira Kenntnisse sind von Vorteil Du beherrschst die deutsche Sprache in Wort und Schrift sehr gut Bei idealo erwartet Dich Hochmotivierte Kolleg innen die sich jetzt schon auf Deine Unterstützung freuen und darauf mit Dir gemeinsam Strategien zu entwickeln und zusammen Ziele zu erreichen Eine offene Unternehmenskultur in der Ehrlichkeit Mut und Toleranz im Mittelpunkt stehen Die Möglichkeit der Weiterbildung für Deine individuelle Karriere Kreativität und Innovation Um idealos Bekanntheit zu steigern ist uns keine Idee zu verrückt Vertrauensarbeitszeiten Wir bieten Dir genügend Freiraum bei der Gestaltung von Freizeit und Beruf Der Freiraum selbst zu bestimmen wie Dein Tag aussehen soll und viel Eigenverantwortung Ein dynamisches Arbeitsumfeld und optimale Arbeitsbedingungen bieten Dir die ideale Grundlage Deiner Kreativität und Leistung im Beruf freien Lauf zu lassen Onboarding Programm inklusive Welcome Day Schulungen und individueller Einarbeitung Über idealo idealo ist eine Erfolgsgeschichte aus Berlin Im Jahr 2000 sind wir mit der Mission gestartet unseren Nutzer innen zu helfen richtige Kaufentscheidungen zu treffen Im Herzen Berlins arbeiten fast 1000 Mitarbeiter innen aus 40 Nationen an der Zukunft des Online Shoppings Wir konzentrieren uns auf agiles und eigenverantwortliches Arbeiten Nachhaltigkeit und ein ausgewogenes Verhältnis von Arbeit und Privatleben Diese Werte sind fester Bestandteil unserer Unternehmensphilosophie Als Teil unseres Teams kannst Du Dich auf Freiheit ein internationales und inspirierendes Arbeitsumfeld freuen Deine Ideen sind uns dabei besonders wichtig Unser Produktportfolio ist so vielfältig wie die Menschen die daran mitarbeiten Chancengleichheit Diversität und Inklusion gehören zu unserer bunten Unternehmenskultur Deswegen wollen wir Dich so wie Du bist Unabhängig davon wo Du herkommst welche Hautfarbe Du hast woran Du glaubst mit welchem Geschlecht Du Dich identifizierst wen Du liebst oder ob Du eine Behinderung hast Hinweis für Bewerber innen mit Behinderung Als Bewerber in mit Behinderung kannst Du Dich während des Bewerbungsprozesses von unserer Schwerbehindertenvertretung SBV beraten lassen idealo stellt während der COVID 19 Pandemie weiter ein Wir stellen weiterhin Bewerber innen aus der ganzen Welt ein Unser Interview Prozess ist vollständig remote wir freuen uns jedoch schon bald im hybrid mode zurück im Büro zu sein Die idealos werden dann einen Teil ihrer Arbeitszeit im Office und einen Teil remote verbringen Was sich dahinter verbirgt erklären wir gerne im gemeinsamen Gespräch mit Euch

column3: Junior Digital Marketing Manager Sweden m f d
column11: tink is the expert for selling connected home products and services The company was founded in Berlin in 2016 With our more than 100 employees we set ourself the goal of getting everyone excited about connected homes In doing so we focus not only on marketing the smart hardware but also on all associated services such as consultation installation insurance and rental models In 2018 tink was honored the Tech5 Award as one of the fastest growing startups in Europe and has already been able to win more than 700 000 customers in five countries for its platform The investors behind tink are Rocket Internet Cadence Growth Capital ProSiebenSat 1 and the Swedish energy provider Vattenfall Now we are looking for additional smart and highly motivated employees to grow tink Tasks Are you passionate about marketing products and enjoy seeing the results of your work swiftly while having significant impact within the company Are you highly analytical and enjoy digging into data Digital marketing enables customer feedback in real time which allows you to make more informed decisions on how to approach the consumer on multiple touchpoints within the marketing funnel and thereby grow revenue As a digital marketing manager at tink you will be responsible to unlock Sweden as a market across multiple acquisition channels platforms such as Facebook Google Criteo etc The role will allow you to build up and scale the channels for success while working closely within the performance marketing team to employ best practices for growth solve problems and generate learnings You are responsible for the planning creation and management of our Swedish paid digital marketing channels social and search engines You optimize campaigns according to best practices and learnings while working on automation and growing the channels according to relevant KPIsYou analyze available data closely monitor your results set up reporting and benchmark continuouslyYou are hands on and enjoy digging deepYou test hypotheses with available data and generate learningsYou work closely with the performance marketing team to solve problems and share your issues and learnings Requirements You are fluent in Swedish and EnglishYou have a track record of successfully managing paid marketing channels paid social SEA display towards efficiency and growth targetsYou are analytical and enjoy working in a data driven environmentYou have experience with tools such as Excel metabase and datastudio Ideally you have some experience with SQL R or Python for automation and data analysisYou like to share your ideas and develop concepts to improve processes evaluate test results and generate recommendations for actionYou have an affinity for technology and understand how data driven advertising feed and tracking systems workYou work in a well structured way have a high quality approach and a good eye for details while being able to work in a fast paced environment without losing your coolYou work well independently and can structure and prioritize your workday successfully to maximize output effectivelyYou enjoy sharing knowledge proactively with the team and working in an international dynamic environment Benefits Work in a young and international teamWe are an experienced founding team with multi year start up industry and consulting experienceWe are a highly engaged and motivated team with a flat hierarchyWe provide you with a high level of flexibility and creative freedomWe will give you challenging tasks and support your personal developmentOur offices are located directly in the heart of Berlin Mitte Hackescher Markt We offer you a dynamic startup culture with extra benefits for instance a tink credit card with a monthly budget a contribution for Urban Sports Club Team Events and the snack bar is always stocked We make sure that you look forward to coming to work every day Interested Then we are excited about receiving your application to be a part of our growing team in Berlin

column3: Senior Amazon PPC Manager m f d
column11: Berlin Brands Group BBG has been designing producing and selling products in the home living consumer electronics sound light and sports categories since 2005 and is now one of Europe s largest digital companies BBG creates builds buys and scales consumer brands globally Our scalable infrastructure and profitable commercial model is driving hyper growth last year reporting 2020 revenues of 334M Our products are sold across channels including direct to consumer e commerce online marketplaces including Amazon and wholesale to retailers and distributors Our passion lies in kitchen appliances garden living sports and HiFi Our largest and best known brands are Klarstein auna blumfeldt and Capital Sports These are just a few examples within our portfolio of over 23 consumer product brands that is rapidly expanding as we welcome new brands to the group We distribute over 3 700 products to consumers in 28 countries worldwide BBG is now over 1 000 employees strong working in locations spanning the globe from Europe UK USA to Asia Our global headquarters are in Berlin Germany and we are now rapidly expanding our business We are scaling up and investing in world class logistics and fulfilment innovative digital marketing e commerce marketplace development and other sales channels To fuel this growth we are looking for talented and motivated colleagues like you to join us in shaping the DNA of BBG Your responsibilities You manage and optimize multiple paid advertising accounts across several marketing platforms and brands You analyze and measure the success of various advertising campaigns as well as the performance in general You ensure to reach defined target goals and control the marketing budget within your accounts and channels You help us with expanding our marketing activities to new marketing platforms You help us with testing and rolling out of new advertising formats and processes across all our paid advertising channels You will work with us across several brands with different business attributes customer profiles brand attributes and go to market strategies Your profile You have a good degree in marketing business administration or a similar education You have experience in paid campaign management on either Google or Amazon ideally within an eCommerce or agency environment You are completely confident with Excel basic programming knowledge in JavaScript or Python is a plus You are task driven and initiative taking within a dynamic atmosphere You have exceptional organization skills You are fluent in English We offer An international marketing team that welcomes you and your ideasFlexible working hours and a modern office in the heart of Berlin Spittelmarkt Company benefits such as public transport ticket grant 30 discount on products from our own shop and employer s contribution to the company pension planDaily fresh fruits and vegetables as well as drinks and various health offers physiotherapy yoga and back training courses Opportunities for professional development language courses as well as team training and coachingAn international and dynamic working environment we celebrate success together at numerous company events JOIN THE GANG Become a member of one of Europe s leading ecommerce companies and fill out the online application below We are looking forward to your application Berlin Brands Group Wallstr 16 10179 Berlin www berlin brands group com

column3: Director Web Marketing
column11: About The Opportunity Contentful is looking for an experienced Web Marketing leader to drive our global web strategy and execution and deliver a world class digital experience on Contentful com Our ideal candidate has a passion for interactive design and a firm grasp of new technologies with the goal of creating an exceptional user experience designed to drive demand and build our brand with a focus on improving website conversion rates for sign ups and leads The successful candidate will exhibit solid business judgment top notch project management skills strategic thinking and strong creative and analytical skills You ll be responsible for the performance and continuous improvement of Contentful com leading the creation of various engaging interactive projects and overseeing all of our digital properties inclusive of the underlying infrastructure systems and processes as well as deploying marketing analytics to further optimize our online marketing investments Your primary goal will be to implement programs that attract a qualified audience to our digital properties and convert them to viable sales prospects What to expect Create the strategy for the design build maintenance and optimization of our online presence to increase organic visits referrals and ultimately conversions troubleshoot issues as they ariseManage a team consisting of web developers and UX designers and liaise with an internal product team to fulfill this strategyIdentify new trends insights emerging technologies and creative growth strategies for increasing our site traffic sales provide thought leadership and perspective for adoption where appropriateLeverage site metrics tools to measure and report performance of all campaigns and properties and optimize spend and priorities based on robust data analysisIdentify and implement forward facing opportunities and tactics that exponentially grow our search visibilityHelp advocate for SEO and SEM best practices and adoption by core cross functional teams including content and creative teamsDevelop implement and monitor test and learn programs A B multi variate etc and personalization across digital channels to enable the continual optimization of inbound digital marketing activitiesLead projects teams utilizing both Agile and traditional project management methodologies What you need to be successful 5 7 years experience as a web project manager web producer or related role ideally in a B2B or consumer facing software industryStrong familiarity and experience creating and updating content within web content management systemsAn understanding of HTML CSS and Javascript development and constraintsDeep working knowledge of online marketing analytics and reporting toolsExperience with site search tag management testing and personalization toolsUnderstanding of CRM and marketing automation systems like Salesforce and Marketo and how they tie in to demand generation websitesAbility to prioritize and drive multiple simultaneous deliverables to execution with minimal supervision in a fast paced environment working with cross functional teamsIntellectual curiosity coupled with a highly analytical approach in assessing what is working and where to drive improved performanceExceptional written and verbal communication skillsYou re an innovative motivated organized high energy team player with attention to detail and sense of humor What s in it for you Join an ambitious tech company reshaping the way people build digital products We set you up for success equipping you with the latest and greatest hardwareEnjoy a full range of events including workshops Contentful hosted meetups guest speakers and team activities Meet your team members from across the globe at our annual offsite Get fit We offer a variety of health and fitness classes and a discount on Urban Sports Club We value our employees health and safety Our teams are working remotely during the COVID 19 pandemic Use your personal education budget to improve your skills and grow in your career Join a free German class or one of our many internal learning initiatives Plus Contentful socks Oh yeah Who are we Contentful powers digital experiences for 28 of the Fortune 500 companies and thousands of global brands Our content platform unifies content in a single hub structures it for use in any digital channel and integrates seamlessly with hundreds of tools through open APIs It lets developers and content creators work in parallel increasing team efficiency and happiness Companies such as Co op Spotify Bang Olufsen N26 Swarovski use Contentful to build their mobile and web products voice controlled apps and more We re growing rapidly and are backed by over 150 million in funding from top tier venture capital firms like Sapphire Ventures Salesforce Ventures General Catalyst and Benchmark More than 400 people from 70 nations contribute their energy and creativity to Contentful working from hubs in Berlin San Francisco and distributed around the world Everyone is welcome here Everyone is welcome here is a celebrated component of our culture At Contentful we strive to create an inclusive environment that empowers our employees We believe that our products and services benefit from our diverse backgrounds and experiences and are proud to be an equal opportunity employer All qualified applications will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color national origin religion sexual orientation gender gender identity age physical dis ability or length of time spent unemployed We invite you to apply and join us By clicking Apply for this job I acknowledge that I have read the Contentful s Candidate Privacy Notice and hereby acknowledge and accept the collection processing use and storage of my personal data as described therein

column3: Media Analyst m f d
column11: We are CARIAD an automotive software company and part of the Volkswagen Group Our mission is to make the automotive experience safer more sustainable more comfortable more digital and more fun Soon we ll be a team of more than 5 000 software developers and engineers building the leading tech stack for the automotive industry and creating a unified software platform for over 10 million new vehicles per year We re looking for talented digital minds like you to help us create code that moves the world Together with you we ll build outstanding digital experiences and products for all Volkswagen Group brands that will transform mobility Join us as we shape the future of the car and everyone around it YOUR TEAM CARIAD is ramping up its communication team that is in charge of internal and external communication affairs Our division has the aim to communicate fast transparently and innovatively These goals come along with the approach of close and agile collaboration within our young venture Although we are a fast growing company within the Volkswagen Group we want to remain as much of the start up mentality as possible CARIAD communication is addressing a large variety of stakeholders including communication divisions of Volkswagen Group and its brands What You Will Do You are the data and analytics crack within the CARIAD communications teamBeing in charge of media monitoring for our company in print media social media radio TV as well as our owned channels and analyzing the data to assess the effectiveness of our media and content campaignsConnecting the data column11: At Vaayu we are on a mission to do our part in solving climate change We know e commerce has a big climate impact and we our focussed on helping retailers lower their carbon emissions Calculating carbon can to months to do and is very expensive We want to democratize this by simplifying carbon calculation and making analytics easy for every online retailer We have built Software that is already serving sustainability thought leaders like Armed Angels and Organic Basics We are a remote first company based in Berlin looking to hire great people from all across Europe or equivalent timezones We are looking for team members who love innovating want to work at a purpose driven startup and will collaborate with us in shaping the culture of a growing team as we help make a positive impact on our planet Tasks We are looking for an experienced Marketing Manager to develop our company s marketing strategy This opportunity is perfect for an entrepreneurial minded individual who has a proven track record of formulating and executing digital marketing strategies for B2B software and SaaS products Some things you will do Develop execute and manage marketing strategies that successfully drive top of funnel leads both via inbound and outbound actions Create and optimize targeted campaigns across LinkedIn Programmatic Evaluate the effectiveness of campaigns in achieving their stated objectives including impact on lead generation LTV and retention Build analytics define metrics and track the impact of campaigns along the funnel including pipeline contribution deal acceleration and closed won on Hubspot CRM andBuild a marketing plan and roadmap to constantly improve marketing strategy and communications A nice to have would be knowledge of SEO and Content Marketing Requirements At least 3 years lead generation B2B experience Experience in driving growth using lead generation campaigns search engine optimization SEO paid social and display marketing Expertise in setting up and operating automation and CRM software such as Marketo Google Analytics Hubspot Salesforce etc Proven track record and experience building and leading complex marketing programs and reporting on the results Expert project management skills and highly organized Solid analytical and problem solving skills including metrics driven thinking Works collaboratively within a team as well as autonomously A passion for solving climate change andFluent in English Benefits Highly competitive salary role also comes with employee equity Vaayu is a pre seed stage company The founders have extensive experience in climate retail software engineering and product having worked at companies including Zalando Vimcar Comtravo Topshop Topman Flypay

column3: SEO Manager Italy m f x
column11: When someone says Frog you don t think of a little green animal but instead you re inspired for your next analysis Then you ve found your position 0 We love SEO and have done so since our inception in 2000 Content is Queen King but technical and data challenges also wait for you It s not just with the SEO Team where you can philosophise about pagination but also with the CMO the CEOs and the SEO Tech Team If you re not fazed by large amounts of data and enjoy the challenge of complex tasks then you ve come to the right place About your new roleAs SEO Manager you are responsible for the conception and implementation of SEO projects that improve the idealo SEO performance with focus on our Italian domain idealo it On top of that you are also contributing to our global SEO strategy and roadmap You conduct keyword research and work on keyword cluster analysis which then allows you to set the content strategy together with the ITA content team You work closely with the ITA Management Team and the ITA Country Manager in order to create the overall strategy for idealo it Projects are not limited to the Italian market some of your initiatives extend to all idealo s 6 countries and come to life in cross functional teams Optimisations of our on page structure internal linking landing pages and search engine crawling also belong to your responsibilities You monitor and evaluate SEO performance come up with concepts tests to improve it and manage the projects from start spec to finish QA evaluation Skills RequirementsSEO is your passion and it s backed up by 2 or more years of professional experience You have already gained experience in technical SEO analysis and reporting and have an understanding of ranking factors for Google s algorithm You have SEO tool knowledge Screaming Frog Sistrix Searchmetrics ahrefs Search Console or similar tools You are adept at using Excel and have a keen eye for data Knowledge of SQL and other databases is also advantageous You are fluent in Italian and in English German is a plus not a must Understanding of HTML CSS is a plus Your benefits at idealoMore than 1200 motivated colleagues from 40 nations Welcome to Berlin our new headquarter with its outstanding modern architecture and light flooded offices is located close to the former Berlin Wall in the center of what used to be the heart of Berlin s news and publishers economy Family friendliness based on deep conviction including flexible working hours remote work options and 30 vacation days per year So happy We have been named Germany s best employer in the Internet multimedia sector for the second year in a row Source Focus Business 01 2021 issue dated 19 02 2021 About idealoidealo is a Berlin success story in 2000 we started out with the mission of helping consumers make the best purchasing decisions Right in the heart of Berlin over 1 000 employees from 40 nations are working on the future of online shopping We focussing on agile and self reliant work sustainability and a healthy relationship between work and private life These values are firmly anchored in our corporate culture and an integral part of our corporate philosophy As part of our team you can look forward to freedom an international and inspiring working environment Your ideas are particularly important to us Not only our product portfolio is diverse but also hire great talent from around the world Due to the ongoing COVID 19 pandemic we are checking almost every day with the authorities if and how we can relocate talent from EU and non EU countries to column3: Senior Manager eCommerce Experience Architect all genders
column11: CX is no longer enough It s time to reimagine business through the lens of experience The emphasis on experience is arguably at its greatest today because the structure of almost everything we do how and what people buy how and where they work and how they interact with others has been upended by world events in 2020 The consumer behavior shifts we re seeing today are not a blip They are likely to stay with us for a long time some likely forever Some have been in motion for years and many have been accelerated by the COVID 19 pandemic This new reality forces businesses to look deeply at how people are experiencing their brands Good CX has become mainstream leading to a sea of sameness Companies that deliver an experience with the entirety of their business are more likely to achieve the highest levels of sustained growth Accenture Interactive is the new kind of partner for a new kind of client Our mission is to drive sustainable growth for clients We leverage our customers WHERE YOUR EXPERTISE IS NEEDED Drive the commercial performance of your markets cluster by being the market expert and providing input for the commercial strategy and calendar You help to shape the investment trade offs decisions together with your market team colleagues Drive the categories performance and platform transition in your markets through local business insights and assortment analysis You will also contribute to further localizing and improving the assortment relevance for our local customers and be in close contact with the dedicated supply category teams Own the local homepage in terms of content and campaigns and execute actions to capture maximal local demand in line with the local trading strategy Plan implement analyse and develop onsite campaigns and navigation points to optimize the customer journey and drive business performance Participate in cross functional projects for your market and interact with local Marketing Social Media and Influencer Marketing Pricing Commercial Planning Supply Digital Experience and other functions on a daily level WHAT WE RE LOOKING FOR At least 5 years of relevant experience in a similar function preferably at a multi national fashion online retailer you round off your professional achievements by at least a bachelor s degree Strong analytical and retail math skills a result oriented mentality with a strong drive to get things done and ability to work independently you have excellent knowledge of Microsoft Office Google Analytics knowledge is a plus Commercial mindset and solid understanding of online fashion trading you have a profound knowledge of the competitive landscape and latest fashion trends in the Romanian or Hungarian market s PERKS AT WORK A workplace run on trust empowerment and column3: Tech Lead Search Experience m f d
column11: Explore a New World Of Possibilities At HomeToGo we re on a mission to make incredible accommodation easily accessible for everyone Our team is united by a passion for travel driven by innovation and impact and guided by open minded leaders at every level Our commitment to recognizing and empowering exceptional talent is the foundation of our growth We are actively hiring candidates from all around the world including sponsoring visas for Germany An amazing journey of opportunity with an international team lies ahead Join us Your Future Contribution We are building a new tech team in the Berlin office and are looking for a senior front end engineer to act as a team lead and help us to build the Search Experience team from the ground up In Search Experience you will mostly work on the search results page the most visible part of HomeToGo We serve millions of users daily and because we only have seconds to make the first impression as people say it s crucial for us to deliver the best user experience You will work directly with product owners to set team goals plan and run weekly sprints mentor your colleagues and suggest impactful improvements How You ll Add Value Work hand in hand with business stakeholders to identify requirements plan milestones and polish the features by measuring performance Choose adequate technical and business metrics to monitor features and manage risk Ensure the technical feasibility of UI UX designs long term reliability scalability and maintainability Drive a weekly planning process together with product owners Lead a team of engineers mentor team members Develop for both mobile and desktop with a mobile first mentality You ll Be Successful In This Role If You Have experience as a team leader Are proficient with modern Front end tools TypeScript React Redux etc Have experience with common front end development tools such as Webpack Yarn etc Have experience with behavioral tests such as Cypress preferred but not essential Have solid understanding of responsive design and best practices Have experience on building large scale single page applications Have strong technical ability to develop designs into efficient and reusable code Know how to use version control system Git Can speak fluent English What HomeToGo Offers Career growth opportunities and promotions 360 feedback and open feedback culture mentoring opportunities from an international team of passionate industry experts Culture driven by our Leadership Principles entrepreneurial results driven encouraging ownership and enabling each other to succeed Transparency about company goals collaboration and support from an international team Caring for the environment proud to be a certified ClimatePartner and a climate neutral company as well as our employees work life balance weekly yoga classes personal training discounts mentoring program and psychological support Attractive benefits package including competitive compensation flexible remote work policy visa sponsorship and relocation support Additional benefits include language courses full IT support and equipment internal workshops and trainings company and team events modern and centrally located office additional holidays Travel Industry Card Check out what your future colleagues have said about us on Glassdoor and Kununu Who We Are HomeToGo is a marketplace with the world s largest selection of vacation rentals listing millions of offers from thousands of trusted partners including Airbnb Booking com Vrbo and TripAdvisor From vacation homes cabins beach houses apartments condos house boats castles farm stays and everything in between HomeToGo combines price destination dates and amenities to find the perfect accommodation for any trip worldwide Founded in 2014 HomeToGo employs more than 350 people and manages 23 local apps websites across Europe North America South America Australia and Asia Pacific HomeToGo also operates brands such as Tripping com CASAMUNDO and Wimdu HomeToGo is an Equal Opportunity Employer committed to hiring and nurturing exceptional talent representing various backgrounds perspectives and skills We are authentically candid and open minded fostering a safe environment for diverse opinions Our hiring decisions are based on qualifications merit and business needs We do not discriminate against race ethnic origin gender sexual orientation religion political ideological or religious views disability or age Apply for this position

actionable insights and recommendations for performance uplift You understand concepts of tracking incrementality statistical significance You are able to learn quickly e g new channels and enjoy working in a fast paced environment You are proactive and know how to deliver the right outcome You have an attention to detail and are comfortable to work in fast paced environments You speak fluent column3: Senior Growth Product Manager
column11: About Toptal Toptal is a global network of top freelance talent in business design and technology that enables companies to scale their teams on demand With 100 million in annual revenue and over 40 year over year growth Toptal is the world s largest fully remote company We take the best elements of virtual teams and combine them with a support structure that encourages innovation social interaction and fun We see no borders move at a fast pace and are never afraid to break the mold Position Description We are looking for a Senior Growth Product Manager to drive the growth of both our freelance talent network and client base You will partner with our Growth Marketing team and collaborate with teams across the business including Design Engineering Marketing SEO Operations and Product Management to rapidly test and iterate on new features As a Senior Growth Product Manager you will lead a team of Growth Product Managers focused on SMB small and medium sized business Leads Enterprise Leads and Talent Network Growth You will be responsible for shaping product strategies mentoring Growth Product Managers and managing stakeholder relationships to ensure smooth product releases that continue to grow the Toptal business This role will report directly to the Director of Growth Product This role involves a mix of leadership and hands on work You will also be responsible for generating ideas to acquire new leads and seeing them through to demonstrate impact across the business While you may not be involved in the day to day sprint ceremonies you re not afraid to jump in and help out in feature development You are also responsible for ensuring the implementation of the product roadmap driving brainstorming and experimentation and executing the vision We are looking for someone who isn t afraid to present new ideas drive metrics and go after bold initiatives If this sounds like you come join our Growth Product team This is a remote position that can be done from anywhere Due to the remote nature of this role we are unable to provide visa sponsorship Resumes and communication must be submitted in English Responsibilities Lead 3 growth product teams focused on growing our client base and freelance talent network while delivering on our OKRs and driving sustainable growth for Toptal Mentor and shape Growth Product Managers that report to you by providing ongoing product expertise processes and product guidance Continuously formulate and execute a roadmap while working with primary stakeholders your Growth Product Managers and the Director of Growth Product Identify growth opportunities in support of Toptal s growing business Facilitate meetings and workshops that drive collaboration prioritization and improve impact ensuring that good decisions get made Establish effective relationships across a wide range of teams in the business Establish a shared understanding of business priorities and strategy within each of your product teams Conduct high quality and detailed qualitative and quantitative research to evolve and inform the direction of product development In The First Week Expect To Onboard and integrate into Toptal meet the teams and people you will have long term working relationships with Partner with the Director of Product to get a fundamental understanding of the vision strategy teams goals and processes Work closely with your reports focused on freelance talent network growth and client growthExplore the history of the product and team including assets design standards content strategy roadmap and unexplored opportunities that you can lead Independently start to study and learn the Toptal platform and product suite In The First Month Expect To Work alongside the Director of Product on the execution of initiatives ensuring designs meet requirements initiatives are well defined and everything is delivered to specification Start working with each of your Growth Product Managers to gain an understanding of their current product areas goals and metrics we want you to get acquainted with Toptal processes through doing Begin to dive into user behavior using our analytics tools and platforms to provide insight into the Growth team and your squad to inform the product roadmap Identify areas of growth and opportunities for both your product area and your product team In The First Three Months Expect To Take ownership of your team roadmap coordinating with senior leadership and stakeholders where necessary Ensure that your teams are appropriately staffed and are collaborating with engineering design and content strategy when necessary to recruit and onboard more people Contribute ideas and facilitate workshops and discussions for new experiments and initiatives In The First Six Months Expect To Be able to demonstrate a clear measure of your impact through business results your partner relationships and execution excellence In The First Year Expect To Drive significant impact on client and talent network growth Requirements See the list below as a guide We are interested in hearing from intelligent driven people with prior experience in product management Does this sound like you Please apply A BA BS degree preferably with a focus on Business or Marketing 5 years of professional experience in either product management or growth product with solid exposure to product management meaning you have owned multiple products brands or features within your organization 2 years of people leadership experience within the product and or growth scope of work and have experience mentoring junior product managers Outstanding written and verbal communication skills Experience leading design and engineering teams driving the development of high quality pages and digital experiences that effectively accomplish business goals while maintaining brand standards Experience with online growth Lead Acquisition SEO and performance marketing is a plus Intermediate level quantitative analytics skills including at least basic SQL skills A knack for building simple and effective user interfaces and the ability to communicate ideas and direction through mockups and wireframes An understanding of design thinking user research and user testing An extremely sharp eye for detail and a strong sense of what types of creative products will be both effective for growth and representative of the Toptal brand Ability to thrive in rapidly changing environments with a strong willingness and ability to eliminate ambiguity and execute You are the type of person that craves accountability rather than shuns it A demonstrated ability to manage multiple projects at once Be open to receiving feedback and constructive criticism A background in web development or an understanding of core fundamental concepts would be advantageous You must be a world class individual contributor to thrive at Toptal You will not be here just to tell other people what to do For Toptal Use Only natechcities ustech naproductcities canada europe uk individualcontributorEurope PN 1

column3: Growth Marketing Manager m f d at Pomélo Co GmbH
column11: Your mission You are a strategic marketing mastermind and love to challenge the status quo Then become part of our team and help us increase long term revenue growth as a Growth Marketing Manager m f d in Germany ideally Berlin Develop and maintain all aspects of customer acquisition on digital channels including channel management audience building paid social media buying creative ad direction and testing Make the calls on audience sizing spend allocation budget optimization channel mix and overall prioritization of campaigns in close cooperation with the VP MarketingHelp launch and guide customer acquisition in new exploratory markets and channelsCooperate with the Marketing team to ensure functionality and measurability of funnel performanceMeasure and report key findings from campaigns to help inform short and long term marketing effort and share weekly and monthly acquisition reports with internal stakeholdersIdentify build and optimize new customer journeys flows in collaboration with Marketing to drive continuous improvement Your profile You successfully completed your bachelor s or master s degree in the field of Marketing Digital Marketing Performance Marketing or equivalentYou have at least 3 years of professional experience in marketing or performance marketing with demonstrable success in achieving growth in digital channel acquisition ideally gained in e commerce beauty consumer goods and or social media experience is a plusYou are comfortable in a technology driven numbers oriented business environmentYou have fluent English and at least good German language skills written and spoken French or Italian language skills are a plusYou have the ability to develop robust concepts to tackle new business challenges and derive efficient and impactful solutions from thatYou have an entrepreneurial mindset with hands on commercial experience you are a self starter and love to take on responsibility for your projectsYou are comfortable working in an early stage environment where tools need to be built and initiatives get frequently challenged according to new priorities that might come up What We Offer You Fast moving startup atmosphere with flat hierarchies and an office in a central location in BerlinFlexible working hours partly remote work possible currently in home office full time Opportunity to further develop our international companyUnlimited employment contractUrban Sports Club membership M free of charge and subsidy for larger memberships

column3: Senior Growth Performance Marketing Manager
column11: foodpanda Delivery Hero Germany GmbH is on an ambitious mission curating and delivering Germany s best neighborhood restaurants stores and groceries right to the door We re changing the delivery landscape in Germany by providing everything people want and need fast and from one app From favorite restaurants to fresh groceries and local shops we are connecting people to their neighborhoods like never before We wouldn t be able to do this without an amazing network of passionate partners dedicated logistic suppliers and driven employees from across the globe We re looking to hire our first team mates to join our founding team as we kick off our journey to become Germany s first choice for delivery Delivery Hero Germany GmbH is part of the Delivery Hero Group a global leader in the food delivery industry processing over 663 million orders in Q1 2021 and operating in around 50 markets in the world with 29 000 employees and approximately 700 000 riders globally We re currently looking for a Senior Growth Performance Marketing Manager f m d to join our foodpanda Germany team What s On The Menu For You Your mission is online customer acquisition You are responsible for performance across all digital channels working closely with Central teams SEM Paid Social App Marketing Display You are the main contact for the Regional Head of Performance Marketing working with him and his teams on performance analysis and reporting Together with the Head of Growth you own performance management and target and budget setting Using a data driven approach you develop strategies across key channels to grow the target KPIs You identify high potential opportunities to test to optimize channel mix and CPA What You Can Bring To The Table 3 years of experience in growth or performance marketing ideally in the tech e commerce industry Highly analytical with a love for numbers and problem solving Advanced knowledge of digital channels including Search SEO SEM Display Paid Social YouTube other app networks and CRM comms segmentation Deep understanding of attribution models and tracking systems Excellent communicator including outstanding ability to translate data insights into action and sharing with broader audiences Focus on what matters prioritization and stakeholder management is key Growth is your mindset What We Can Offer You A vibrant and international team with multicultural and diverse backgrounds Solving challenges with inspiring colleagues in an all hands on deck environment We take care of our employees and offer flexible working hours with the option of working from home in Berlin as well as from our office Join an ambitious project with a competitive remuneration package and a lot of career development opportunities Competitive package incentives allowances food perks Join company parties team cultural and sports events due to the current situation on a virtual basis Have we caught your attention If you are looking for an environment where our company DNA is defined by our values please send us your CV At foodpanda we believe diversity and representation are key to creating not only an exciting product but also an amazing customer and employee experience Fostering this starts with hiring therefore we do not discriminate on the basis of race religion color national origin gender sexual orientation age marital status or any other aspect that makes you you
